GSP31yuktdipu:20: pārārthyañca tathānaikyaṃ viyogo yoga eva ca // 10 //
GSP31yuktdipu:45: itarathā hi alakṣaṇopetasyāpi sūtrasya tantrāṅgabhāvaḥ syāditi /
GSP31yuktdipu:55: tayorupayogi dṛṣṭāntaṃ sādhyasiddhaye samarthamiti kṛtvā mūlaśakalādayo 'trāntaranabhihitā apyetasmādavasīyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:56: athavā bhikṣorupasaṃhṛtabahiṣkaraṇāntaḥkaraṇasya teṣu teṣvatīndriyeṣu api pradhānādiṣvartheṣu buddhiṃ sūcayatīti sūtram /
GSP31yuktdipu:73: na hi tathā pratyakṣādīni pramāṇānyupadiṣṭāni tathā avayavā upadiṣṭāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:76: yadyapi sūtrakāreṇāvayavopadeśo na kṛtastathāpi bhāṣyakārāḥ kecideṣāṃ saṃgrahaṃ cakruḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:85: kintarhyanupadiṣṭamapyeṣāmastitvaṃ liṅgāt pratipadyāmahe yadayamācāryo duḥkhatrayābhighātājjijñāsā tadapaghātake hetāviti (ISk 1)
GSP31yuktdipu:97: tena vayaṃ liṅgātpratipadyāmahe santi jijñāsādayo 'vayavāḥ śāstra iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:100: śāstre teṣāmanupadeśe prayojanaṃ vaktavyam- amuṣmāddhetorācāryeṇa nopadiśyante,
GSP31yuktdipu:108: pramāṇaṃ ca naste ācāryā ityataścānupadeśo jijñāsādīnāmiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:114: yo yatrābhiyuktaḥ karmaṇi cāduṣṭassa tatrāptastasyopadeśa āptavacanamiti teṣāmapyanupadeśaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:115: atha sati tantrāntaropadeśe pramāṇānyupadiśyante nāvayavā iti,
GSP31yuktdipu:119: yattūktaṃ pramāṇānupadeśaprasaṅga iti atra brūmaḥ- ayuktametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:122: upadeśameva tu sadoṣa iti kṛtvā kaḥ pratyācakṣīta ?
GSP31yuktdipu:125: tadyathā, takṣṇuhi caitra ityukte yāvadbhissādhanaviśeṣairvinā takṣaṇaṃ nopapadyate sarvāstāṃścaitra upādatte /
GSP31yuktdipu:126: tathā pratyakṣādiṣu pramāṇeṣūpadiṣṭeṣu yaireṣāmavinābhāvaḥ sarvāṇi tānyupādāsyāmahe /
GSP31yuktdipu:134: paśyati tvācāryo nādṛṣṭāntaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhyamāpnotīti kṛtvā pratipādakāḥ pratipādanakāle tantrāntaropadiṣṭānapi mūlaśakalādīnākṣepsyanti iti
GSP31yuktdipu:138: ākhyātasya hi pratyāmnāye bhūtavācinā śabdenopadeśo bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:144: tantrāntaropadiṣṭo 'pi karmayonīnām prāṇabhedādīnāṃ ca lakṣaṇopadeśassaṃgṛhīto bhavatīti siddhaṃ tantrāntaropadeśādavayavānupadeśaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:166: tadyathā mahadādi tacca kāryaṃ prakṛtivirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ cetyukte (ISk 8)
GSP31yuktdipu:167: saṃśayo bhavati kena dharmeṇa kāryaṃ prakṛtivirūpaṃ kena vā sarūpamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:173: arthatastat yathā tebhyo bhūtāni pañca pañcabhyaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:200: prayatnato bhagavataḥ paramarṣerārṣeṇa jñānena sarvatattvānāṃ svarūpamupalabhya saṃjñāṃ vidadhato nāsti svarūpanibandhanaḥ śabdaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:222: ityevamanyā api tantrayuktayaḥ śakyā iha pradarśayitum /
GSP31yuktdipu:226: yadi khalvapīdamapi prakaraṇaṃ syāt tantrāntare pātañjalapañcādhikaraṇavārṣagaṇaprabhṛtīnāmanyatamasya śeṣabhūtaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:236: āha, kiṃguṇaviśiṣṭāya śiṣyāya punaridaṃ tantraṃ vyākhyeyamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:237: ucyate- jijñāsave matimate mīmāṃsakāyārthine 'bhyupagatāya śiṣyāya vyākhyeyaṃ śāstram /
GSP31yuktdipu:245: kathaṃ nāma śiṣyasya niḥśreyasena yogaḥ syādityevamarthamidaṃ vyākhyānaṃ kriyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:246: āha, yaduktaṃ jijñāsave vyākhyānaṃ kartavyamiti tatra kutaḥ punariyaṃ jijñāsā kasmin vārthe bhavatīti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:247: ucyate - yattāvaduktaṃ kutaḥ punariyaṃ jijñāsā bhavatītyatra brūmaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:253: prādhānyācca vyatiriktabuddhyā gṛhyamāṇaṃ sambandhitvādādhārasya bhedanibandhanāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhyā nimittattvaṃ pratipadyate- duḥkhānāṃ trayaṃ duḥkhatrayam
GSP31yuktdipu:264: kartari yau tṛjakau tābhyāṃ saha ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:270: kadācidguṇinā guṇo viśiṣyata iti cūrṇikārasya prayogaḥ tasmadanavadyametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:275: maṅgalādīni hi śāstrāṇi prathante vīrapuruṣāṇi ca bhavanti,
GSP31yuktdipu:283: tathā hi padārthavyatirekeṇa viśiṣṭa eva vākyārthaḥ pratīyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:293: yadā tu devadatta gāmabhyāja śuklāmityucyate tadā devadattena gośabdena karmāntarebhyo vicchidya svātmanyavasthāpyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:294: kriyā ca gośabdaśca sarvakartṛbhyo devadattakarmatayā vyavasthāpyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:296: śuklaśabdo gośabdaśca gośabdaṃ sarvaguṇaviṣayamādheyāntarebhyo vyavacchedya svātmana ādhāratve niyamya,
GSP31yuktdipu:298: kevalānāntu padānāṃ sāmānyārthāt pracyutānāmviśeṣānabhidhānādānarthakyam / āha ca-
GSP31yuktdipu:303: evaṃ sati kuto 'yaṃ niścayapratilambho yadduḥkhaśabdo 'yamamaṅgalārtho yāvatā sandihyata eva ayaṃ kiṃ svārthapratipattyarthamupātto 'tha heyatvāyeti
GSP31yuktdipu:316: yadyapi ekaṃ duḥkhaṃ tathāpi nimittānāmadhyātmādhibhūtādhidaivalakṣaṇānāṃ bhedādasya bhedopacāraḥ kariṣyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:332: tadyathā catvāro varṇā ityasyāḥ saṃkhyāyāḥ sati paippalādādibhede teṣāṃ brāhmaṇatvādivyatirekābhāvānna saṃkhyāntarahetutvaṃ no khalvapi varṇāvyatirekādekatvaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:333: evaṃ trīṇi duḥkhānītyasyāḥ saṃkhyāyāḥ sati śarīrādibhede teṣāmādhyātmikādivyatirekāsambhavānna saṅkhyāntarahetutvaṃ no khalvapi duḥkhāvyatirekādekatvaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP31yuktdipu:334: kiñcānyat, nimittabhedād bhedopacāra iti bhavāneva pratipannaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:338: yathāsurerduḥkhatrayābhighātājjijñāsā bhavatītyetadiṣṭaṃ tena sarveṣāmabhighāto 'stīti sarveṣāṃ jijñāsāprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:339: atha mataṃ duḥkhābhighāte kasyacijjijñāsā bhavati kasyacinneti /
GSP31yuktdipu:342: prāgapyāsurerjijñāsāyā duḥkhatrayābhighāto na cāsyātyantike hetau jijñāsā babhūva /
GSP31yuktdipu:358: parikalpyamānā khalvapīyaṃ jijñāsā puruṣasya vā syādguṇānāṃ vā /
GSP31yuktdipu:363: na hyacetanā ghaṭādayo hitāhitaprāptiparihāraṃ jijñāsamānā dṛśyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:368: na ca guṇapuruṣavyatiriktaṃ vastutastattvāntaramasti yasya jijñāsā parikalpyamānā parikalpyeta /
GSP31yuktdipu:378: athāpi syādyeyamasati viśeṣe sarvaprāṇabhṛtāmāsurereva bhagavato duḥkhatrayābhighātabuddhirbhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:380: na hyantareṇa nimittamasau viśeṣo 'vasthāpayituṃ śakyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:383: kuto jijñāsā bhavatītyevaṃ codakena pūrvamakāri praśnastasyāśca sākṣāt kāraṇamabhighātaḥ kāraṇāntarāṇāmanabhidhānādityasyaiva nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:385: atha nirbandhaḥ kriyate tena pūravadharmānugrahasya kuśalamūlābhyāsaparipākasya kāraṇakāraṇatvamasmābhirna pratiṣidhyata iti tadeva kiṃ na gṛhyate
GSP31yuktdipu:392: na tu tadvyatiriktāḥ kāmarūpārūpyadhātavaḥ kvacidapi siddhāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:393: caturdaśavidhe ca saṃsāre yā sukhamātrā sā duḥkhabhūyastvāttacchabdavācyā bhavatīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:395: atra janmajarāmaraṇakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāpnoti cetanaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:408: tasmātpratiṣedhya evāyaṃ pakṣa iti na kiñcidabhidhīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:413: yo 'yamācāryeṇa tacchabdaḥ sūtre paṭhito 'sya khalu pratipadamasambandhāt svalpāmapyarthavattāṃ nopalabhāmahe /
GSP31yuktdipu:415: ucyate- kathaṃ hi nāma prayoktṛpāratantryācchabdasya śabdāntareṇa sambandho na syāditi ?
GSP31yuktdipu:416: āha, na brūmo 'vidyamānasambandho 'sambandhaḥ kintarhyayuktasambandho yaḥ sa khalvasambandhaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:417: tadyathā anācāro māṇavaka iti dravyeṇa kriyāśaktitvānna śakyaṃ kiñcidanācāravatā kṣaṇamapyavasthātum /
GSP31yuktdipu:419: tathā cāsya tacchabdasya pratipadaṃ sambandho na yuktastasmādanarthakastacchabdaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:421: anantarasya vidhirvā bhavati pratiṣedho vetyanayā yuktyā jijñāsāśabdasya tacchabdenābhisambandhaḥ śakya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:424: na hi jijñāsāpaghāte kiñcit prayojanamastīti satyapi sambandhe na tacchabdenārthaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:433: itarathā jvaranimittako dāha iva śītadravyasaṃsparśātpraśānto 'pi nimittāvasthānātpunaḥ punaḥ pravartate ityaphalatvamasya vyāyāmasya /
GSP31yuktdipu:449: na caikasminkāle śabdasya pradhānatvamupasarjanatvaṃ ca yuktitaḥ sambhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:463: na tu vayaṃ guṇalakṣaṇasya duḥkhasyāpaghātaṃ brūmaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:470: aviśeṣātkalpayitvāpi vṛttyapaghātaṃ vṛttivṛttimatorananyatvād vṛttyapaghāte vṛttimadapaghātaḥ prāpta iti nāsti kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:475: yadi tarhi tacchabdasya duḥkhaśabdenaivābhisambandho 'bhyupagamyate tena ye 'smābhiḥ pūrvamabhihitā doṣāste prasajyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:483: ucyatāntarhi kintat pratividhānaṃ yasyāvaṣṭambhenānekadoṣavyāhato 'pyayaṃ pakṣa āśrīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:486: yattāvaduktamanekapadavyavadhānānna duḥkhaśabdasya tacchabdenābhisambandha ityatra brūmaḥ na,
GSP31yuktdipu:488: yo hyanantarakṛtaṃ śabdasya śabdāntareṇa saha sambandhamācaṣṭe tampratyayamupālambhaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:494: śāstre ca vyavahitānāmapi sarvanāmnāmabhisambandho dṛśyate “yasya guṇasya hi bhāvāddravye śabdaniveśastadabhidhāne tvatalā“vityatrārthakṛtaśca sambandhaḥ śabdānāmabhyupagataḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:499: tathā “anaḍvāhamudahāriṇi bhagini vahasi yā tvaṃ śirasi kumbhamavācīnamabhidhāvantamadrākṣīriti” vārtike dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:500: na hyatra satyānantarye śirasānaḍuho vahanaṃ kumbhasya vā saraṇamupapadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:505: na tu vayaṃ samāsavṛttereva tacchabdenābhisambandha iti pratipadyāmahe,
GSP31yuktdipu:506: kintarhi samāsādapoddhṛtasya buddhivyavasthitasyopajanitasvātantryasya śabdāntareṇa sambandhamicchāma iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:507: athaitadaniṣṭam “yogapramāṇe ca tadabhāve darśanaṃ syāt” “atha śabdānuśāsanaṃ,
GSP31yuktdipu:508: keṣāṃ śabdānām” iti caivamādīnāmprayogāṇāṃ virodhaḥ prāpnoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:515: kintarhi puruṣārthanibandhanā caritārtha śaktirasya puruṣārthapravṛttau prayojanāsadbhāvādātmakalpena vyavatiṣṭhata ityetadvivakṣitam /
GSP31yuktdipu:532: ekāntaśca atyantaṃ ca te ekāntātyante tayorabhāva ekāntātyantato 'bhāvaḥ tasmāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:534: ṣaṣṭhyā eva vā tasiḥ ṣaṣṭhyā vyāśraya iti yogavibhāgāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:537: tathā hi, stryādīnāṃ satyetasmin doṣadvaye 'śakyamarjjanaṃ kartumasvābhāvikatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:545: yadāyurvedavihitasya kriyākramasyābhiyuktamātmavantaṃ bheṣajabhiṣakparicārakasampannaṃ pratyānarthakyam / āha ca -
GSP31yuktdipu:555: mahatā khalvapi prayatnena nivartitā vyādhayaḥ punarutpadyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:562: yadi hi stryādayo viṣayāḥ sarvadā duḥkhapratīkārasamarthā bhaveyuḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:563: kimati teṣu sannihiteṣu viṣayiṇo viṣayāntarajighṛkṣā syāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:567: yadi hi viṣayopabhogo 'tyantameva mānasaṃ duḥkhamapahanyāt kiṃ prāptaṃ yena bhūyastaṃ prati viṣayiṇo 'bhilāṣaḥ syāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:569: yasmānna hyavidyamāne tamasi devadattasya pradīpaṃ pratyapekṣā bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:570: dṛśyate ca nivṛttecchānāmapi viṣayopabhogādviṣayiṇāṃ bhūyo viṣayābhilāṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:572: kintarhi sutarāṃ vṛddhiṃ karoti / āha ca -
GSP31yuktdipu:581: viṣayiṇā pradīyamāno vārthibhyaḥ parimitatvādavacchidyetetyanupāyo 'yaṃ duḥkhāpaghāte buddhimatām /
GSP31yuktdipu:586: nābhijātiṃ na vijñānaṃ na ca śauryamapekṣate /
GSP31yuktdipu:601: gato vaneṣu ramate sa sukhāni samaśnute //
GSP31yuktdipu:604: na hi supratiniviṣṭasyāpi kāminaḥ sarvatra viṣayasannidhānena bhavitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:608: viyoge ca sati dhruvo 'niṣṭānubandha iti ko 'rtho viṣayaparigraheṇa ?
GSP31yuktdipu:609: tatra yaduktaṃ dṛṣṭasya hetoḥ sadbhāvādapārthakā jijñāseti etadayuktam // 1 // @----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31yuktdipu:611: āha- yadyekāntātyantato 'bhāvāddṛṣṭe hetāvaparitoṣastena tarhyastyayamanyo heturubhayadoṣavarjitaḥ sa kasmānna parigṛhyate ?
GSP31yuktdipu:615: katham ? evaṃ hyāha - paśubandhena sarvāṃllokān jayati /
GSP31yuktdipu:619: syānmatam pratyakṣata evedaṃ vihitasya karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ nopalabhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:620: tathā hi putrakāma iṣṭiṃ nirūpya duhitaramapi na prāpnoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:621: arthakāmaśca karma kṛtvā māṣakamapi na labhate /
GSP31yuktdipu:630: yadi khalvapi karmaṇaḥ phalavattvaṃ neṣyate tena tannimittasya saṃsāsarasyābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:645: ucyate- mantrabrāhmaṇaṃ yāvadvā purātanamanuśrūyamāṇaṃ prāmāṇyenābhyupagamyate tatrabhavadbhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:649: āha, kiṃ pūrvasmādeva hetorayamānuśraviko heturanabhipreta iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:665: yadi śāstreṇa coditeyaṃ hiṃsā na syāt muktasaṃśayamaviśuddhitvamasyāḥ pratipadyāmahe,
GSP31yuktdipu:671: tasmādadhīyatāṃ yadi kaścidastyubhayapakṣaprasiddho hetuḥ yato nissaṃśayaḥ pratyayaḥ syāditi /
GSP31yuktdipu:678: āptavacanatvaṃ prākprasādhyāsya vedasya paścāt ayamupālambho yuktamabhidhātuṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:682: kasmāt ? puruṣabuddhipūrvakatve sati rāgādiyogācchabdo vicārārhaḥ syāt kimāptavacanaṃ na veti /
GSP31yuktdipu:686: yadi caitasminnarthe bhavānapi paryanupayujyeta - kathamidaṃ niścīyate yaduta prāṇināmiṣṭaśarīravyāpādanādaviśuddhihiṃseti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:689: tasmāt ko 'tra hetuḥ anyatra pramāṇamihaivaitadapramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhati hiṃsāto dharma iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:690: anugrahopaghātalakṣaṇatvādahiṃsāhiṃsayoḥ pratyakṣasiddhiriti cet - athāpi syāt ahiṃsātaścānugraho bhavatīṣṭaśarīravyāpādanalakṣaṇaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:699: ubhayābhidhānācchāstravirodhaprasaṅga iti cet syānmatam tadeva śāstramahiṃsāmāha,
GSP31yuktdipu:704: sāmānye hi śāstramahiṃsāmutsṛjya viśeṣe kratulakṣaṇe 'pavādaṃ śāsti /
GSP31yuktdipu:706: tadyathā - dadhi brāhmaṇebho dīyatāṃ takraṃ kauṇḍinyāyeti /
GSP31yuktdipu:710: yathā khalvapi śāsre pratiṣiddhaṃ kanyāgamanamiti nedānīmabhirūpaḥ pratigṛhya,
GSP31yuktdipu:722: no khalvapi brūmaḥ śāstracoditāyāṃ hiṃsāyāṃ pravartamānasyāniṣṭaphalasambandho bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:723: kintarhi sati svargaprāptinimittatve vedavihitasya karmaṇaḥ samanuṣṭhānaṃ prāṇijamupaghātamantareṇa na sambhavati iti hitakāmairabhyupekṣyate
GSP31yuktdipu:724: yasmāt na hyetaduktaṃ yadanyeṣāmupaghātenātmānugrahaḥ kārya iti / āha -
GSP31yuktdipu:729: yo 'sau hiṃsānimittakaḥ kāruṇyān manasi naḥ paritāpa utpadyate sā khalvaviśuddhirabhipretā /
GSP31yuktdipu:737: yadi cānuśravikasya praśasyatā nābhipretā syāt prakarṣapratyayānupapattiprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:745: jarayā ha etasmāt satrādvimucyate, mṛtyunā ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:751: teṣāṃ cāsvābhāvikatvāt aśakyamarjanaṃ prayogataḥ pūrvaṃ kartumiti pratipāditam /
GSP31yuktdipu:754: yatra hetuśāstrayorvipratipattirbhavati tatra vipralambhabhūyiṣṭhatvādanumānasya balīyaḥ śāstramityavaśayamabhyupagantavyamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:768: yadi punaḥ karmāṇi nityakartavyatayeṣyante tena sannyāsaśāstraṃ hīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:777: yathaiva karmaṇāṃ samanuṣṭhānaṃ śāsti śāstraṃ tathā sannyāsamapi /
GSP31yuktdipu:779: na karmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgenaikenāmṛtatvamānaśuḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:780: pareṇa nākaṃ nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ vibhrājate yadyatayo viśanti //
GSP31yuktdipu:782: na karmaṇā mṛtyumṛṣayo niṣeddhuḥ prajāvanto draviṇamicchamāṇāḥ /

GSP31yuktdipu:794: āha - yadyapyevaṃ śāstraṃ tathāpi samanuṣṭhāne vidhirasti /

GSP31yuktdipu:808: evaṃvidhāṃ hi stutimupaśrutya phalārthine hi yajamānāya vidhiḥ prarocate /

GSP31yuktdipu:836: tadyadi tāvadbhūtārthena prarocayati tathā satyamṛtatvaprāpakasya sannyāsasyāparigrahe viṣayārāgādanyo heturvaktavyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:839: kasmāt ? na hyetadyuktaṃ yadaśreyasi mārge pramāṇabhūta āmnāyo mātṛmodakanyāyenehitārthinaḥ prāṇinaḥ pratārayet /

GSP31yuktdipu:845: yadi khalvapi kiñcit satyaṃ kiñcidanṛtaṃ brūyādvedaḥ tathā sati pauruṣeyavākyavadvedavākye 'pi āśaṃkā prasajyeta /
GSP31yuktdipu:853: anupalambhādadoṣa iti cet syāccaivaṃ yadyasau vidhirupalabhyate /

GSP31yuktdipu:869: katham ? evaṃ hyāha- “tapaḥśraddhe ye hyupavasanti araṇye śāntā vidvāṃso bhaikṣacaryā carantaḥ sūryadvāreṇa te virajasaḥ prayānti yatrāmṛtaḥ sa puruṣo 'vyayātmā /
GSP31yuktdipu:870: ” tatra tapaḥśraddhe ye hyapavasantītyenaṃ śraddhayopetaṃ yamaniyamalakṣaṇaṃ dharmamāha /

GSP31yuktdipu:911: katham ? evaṃ hyāha- “atha ye ime grāme iṣṭāpūrte dattamityupāsate,
GSP31yuktdipu:917: ta iha vrīhiyavā oṣadhivanaspatayastilā māṣā iti jāyante /

GSP31yuktdipu:928: evamihāpi nāsti sambhavaḥ yadeko 'rtho nityaśca syādanityaśceti /

GSP31yuktdipu:950: āha, atiśayayoga idānīmasya hetoḥ kathamanumātavya iti /

GSP31yuktdipu:974: tena tarhi yadvā tadvā vedoktaṃ karma kṛtvā śakyo 'vāptumarthaḥ /

GSP31yuktdipu:1008: yadā tu pradhānasaṃyogo vinivartate tadā nimittābhāve naimittikasyāpyabhāva iti kṛtvā na punardvandvānyanubhavati /

GSP31yuktdipu:1053: katham ? evaṃ hyāha- “satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma yo veda nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ parame vyoman so 'śnute sarvān kāmān saha brahmaṇā vipaścitā /“

GSP31yuktdipu:1079: yaśca śāstramiṣṭāpūrte samupāsyate te dhūmamabhisaṃbhavantīti tadetasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ hīyate /

GSP31yuktdipu:1100: katham ? evaṃ hyāha- “ya ātmāpahatapāpmā vijighatso vipipāso vijaro vimṛtyurviśokaḥ sannyastasaṃkalpaḥ so 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa jijñāsitavyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1101: sarvāṃśca kāmānavāpnoti ya ātmānamanuvidya vijānātīti” prajāpatervacanaṃ śrūyate /

GSP31yuktdipu:1185: samāsāntaravidhānādadoṣa iti cetsyānmatam- yadyetasmin samāse doṣo 'yamupapadyate samāsāntaramatra vidhāsyate mūlaṃ prakṛtīnāṃ mūlaprakṛtiriti

GSP31yuktdipu:1233: evamubhayapakṣavyudāsātsvapakṣasiddhiriti cet athāpi syāt- sadasatoḥ kriyāsambandhaṃ pratyaviśeṣa upadarśyate bhavatā /
GSP31yuktdipu:1238: sa khalveṣa vādī satkāryavādaṃ pratyācaṣṭe tasmātsvaka evainamadhikāre nivartayiṣyāmaḥ /

GSP31yuktdipu:1288: ṣoḍaśakastu vikāro na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ puruṣa iti vakṣyati /

GSP31yuktdipu:1303: tatra rūpabhedāttattvabhedo mā bhūdityevamarthaṃ saptagrahaṇaṃ kriyate /

GSP31yuktdipu:1309: tasmādiha tāvaddṛśyatāmiti siddhaṃ mahadādyāḥ prakṛtivikṛtayaḥ sapteti /

GSP31yuktdipu:1319: tato 'haṅkāratamātrapūrvakatve siddhe sati indriyamahābhūtaparvaṇoḥ punaḥ śruterniyamo bhaviṣyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1320: tadyathā pañca pañcanakhā bhakṣyā ityatra kṣutpratīkārasamarthānāṃ dravyāṇāmarthādeva sarveṣāṃ bhakṣaṇe samprāpte punaḥ śruterniyamo bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:1324: kathaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśako vikāra eveti yathā vijñāyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:1328: atha mataṃ vṛttaparipūranārthamayamasminpradeśe paṭhitastuśabdo yatra nirdoṣastatraivāyaṃ draṣṭavya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1331: mahadādyāḥ prakṛtivikṛtayaḥ saptetyapadiṣṭe kimiti sāṃśayikā bhaviṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1333: athāyamabhiprāyaḥ syāt yadyapyetadarthataḥ siddhaṃ tathāpyayamācāryaḥ sphuṭapratipattyarthamavadhāraṇaṃ pratyādriyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1337: rātsasyetyevamādiṣvantareṇa prayatnamiṣṭato 'vadhāraṇe siddhe anyatra ajādī guṇavacanādeva stautiṇyoreva ṣaṇyabhāsādityevamādiṣu yatnaṃ karoti
GSP31yuktdipu:1341: sati vā punaravadhāraṇārthatve tuśabdasya kathamivātra śakyamavadhāraṇaṃ pratipattum ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1345: yasmāt kila pṛthivyādīnāṃ sanniveśaviśeṣamātraṃ kāryaṃ muṣṭigranthikuṇḍalādivannārthāntarabhūtam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1361: āha - na tarhi idaṃ pratipattavyaṃ ṣoḍaśako vikāra eveti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1365: iha puruṣārthena hetunā sāmyātpracyutānāṃ guṇānāṃ yo 'yaṃ mahadādirviśeṣānto vipariṇāmaḥ sa tattvāntarotpattiniyamena vyavatiṣṭhate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1376: yathā pradhānātsūkṣmataramavasthāntaraṃ nāstīti tatra prakṛtibhāvasya pratyastamayastathā teṣu vikārabhāvapratyastamayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1393: yathā kāraṇāntarāṇi na santi tathottaratra pratiṣedhaḥ kariṣyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1397: kiṃ ca niṣkriyatvāt śuddhatvāccaiṣāṃ vipariṇāmalakṣaṇā parispandalakṣaṇā vā kriyā vibhutvādanupapannā /
GSP31yuktdipu:1402: yadi guṇaiḥ puruṣāṇāmārambhaḥ tadā teṣāmapyacetanatvaṃ syāt,

GSP31yuktdipu:1426: yathā vrīhyāti prameyaṃ prasthādinā pramāṇena paricchidyate evamihāpi vyaktādiprameyaṃ pratyakṣādipramāṇena paricchidyate iti /

GSP31yuktdipu:1439: paramarṣerhi bhagavataḥ jñānaṃ sāṃsiddhikamapramāṇapūrvakamiti vaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1442: ubhayāvadhāraṇe sati ubhayorapi pakṣayorye doṣāste prasajyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:1445: kadāciddyayaṃ pramātā sannihite 'pyādityādau liṅge diṅniścayādiṣvartheṣu pratihanyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1447: ucyate- yaduktaṃ hiśabdāvacanamavadhāraṇānupapatteriti astu pramāṇebhya evetyavadhāraṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1450: sādhyamānarūpāṇi hi vastūni nāntarīyakatvāt svarūpaniṣpattaye sādhanasambandhaṃ pratyākāṃkṣāvanti bhavanti,
GSP31yuktdipu:1462: tatra yadā tamaḥ prakṛṣyate tadā tenābhibhūtatvāt sattvasya tatkāryamanumānaṃ trikālāṅgamuttiṣṭhate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1465: yasya tu niṣpattivaikalyātpramāṇapratibandho neṣṭaḥ tasya svarūpahānaṃ pramāṇānāṃ prāptam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1466: katham ? etāvaddhi teṣāṃ svarūpaṃ yaduta prameyaparicchedaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1468: āha- bahūni pramāṇānyācāryairabhyupagamyante tāni sarvāṇi kiṃ bhavānanumanyate ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1473: anenaitadācaṣṭe- ekameva buddhilakṣaṇaṃ sattvaṃ nimittāntarānugrahopajanitābhiḥ kāryaviśeṣaparicchinnarūpabhedābhiḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:1475: na tu yathā tantrāntarīyāṇāṃ viṣayopanipātibhirindriyairupajanitāvadhyo buddhayastatheha vidyante yāḥ parikalpyamānāḥ svatantrāṇi trīṇi pramāṇāni syuḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1476: syānmatam, kathaṃ punaḥ pramāṇalakṣaṇānāṃ śaktīnāmakavastusanniveśarūpabhedā bhavantīti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1478: yathā sattvādīnāṃ guṇānāmekaśabdādivastusanniveśe 'pi prakāśādikāryabhedādrūpasaṃkaro na bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:1480: yathā vā kartṛkaraṇādhikaraṇasampradānāpādānakarmalakṣaṇānāṃ śaktīnāmekadravyasanniveśe 'pi kāryaviśeṣaparicchinnāni svarūpāṇi na saṃkīryante,
GSP31yuktdipu:1484: na hi kṣaṇabhaṅgasāhasaṃ yuktimantareṇa daṇḍabhayādapi pratipadyāmahe,
GSP31yuktdipu:1485: na tu tasyāmavasara iti sthīyatāṃ tāvat /
GSP31yuktdipu:1486: āha, kathaṃ punaretad gamyate yathā trividhameva pramāṇaṃ na punaranekavidhamapīti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1495: sarveṣāṃ paraparikalpitānāṃ pramāṇānāmasminneva trividhe pramāṇe 'ntarbhāvāditi yāvaduktaṃ syāttāvadidamucyate sarvapramāṇasiddhatvāditi /
GSP31yuktdipu:1496: athavā sarvapramāṇeṣu siddhaṃ sarvapramāṇasiddhaṃ- saptamī siddhaśuṣkapakvabandhairiti samāsaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:1502: anyāni punarasmāt trayāt yathābhinnāni tathā pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1506: iti / tatra dṛṣṭaṃ nāma upāttaviṣayendriyavṛttyupanipātī yo 'dhyavasāyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1507: anumānaṃ dvayoravinābhāvinorekaṃ pratyakṣeṇa pramāya tatpūrvakaṃ sambandyantare yat paścānmānaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1510: mūlalakṣaṇaṃ tu ācāryo vakṣyati svayameva prativiṣayādhyavasāyo dṛṣṭamityādi /
GSP31yuktdipu:1528: avabodhavidhistu yenānupalabdho gavayaḥ sa tasyopalabdhyarthamadhigatagavayaṃ paryanuyuṅkte kiṃrūpo gavaya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1529: sa tasmā ācaṣṭe- yathā gaurevaṃ gavaya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1530: tatra pratipattyātyantānupalakṣitagavayasvarūpo vyākhyātṛpratipāditaprasiddhavastusādharmyajñānāhitasaṃskāraḥ pratipadyate- nūnamevaṃrūpo gavaya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1532: pratyakṣeṇa tamupalabhya yā samākhyāsambandhapratipattiḥ- ayamasāvartho 'sya śabdasya
GSP31yuktdipu:1536: yathā gaurevaṃ gavaya iti cāptopadeśabalāt pratipattā aprasiddhaṃ gavayamupalabhate na sādharmyamātrāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1538: yattu khalviti ha uvāca yājñavalkyasya ityetadaitihyaṃ nāma pramāṇāntaramupakalpyate tadapi vaktṛviśeṣāpekṣatvānna śabdādarthāntaram /
GSP31yuktdipu:1540: yadi hyāptopadeśa upamā syāttena yathā svarge 'psarasaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:1541: uttarāḥ kurava ityevamādiṣvantareṇa sādharmyopādānaṃ pratipattirbhavati evamihāpi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1542: gavayantu ayamākhyātā pratipādayiṣyan prasiddhasādharmyagarbhaṃ śabdamupādatte na kevalam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1545: śabdavyāpārāttadantarbhāva iti cet syānmatam śabdavyāpārasahito 'yaṃ prasiddhasādharmyalakṣaṇārtho gavayapratipattau na kevalaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:1555: sa tu kauśalāddurupapādo 'yamartha iti kṛtvā prasiddhasādharmyamupādatte /
GSP31yuktdipu:1560: yatra hyarthavaśātpratipattirutpadyate na tatra pratipattā vaktṛviśeṣamapekṣate dṛṣṭārtho 'yamadṛṣṭārtho 'yamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1565: yo hi manyate prasiddhasādharmyādeva gavayapratipattiriti yathāśvastathā gavaya ityetasmādapi tasya sampratipattiḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1571: tadyathā bahuṣu niṣaṇṇeṣu ko 'tra devadatta ityukte yo mukuṭī kuṃḍalī vyūḍhoraskastāmrāyatākṣa iti pratyāha /
GSP31yuktdipu:1572: tataśca samākhyāsambandhapratipattiriti pramāṇāntaratvaprasaṅga ityevamanavasthā pramāṇānāṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1574: evaṃ hi na tāvat parata upamānaṃ pramāṇāntaram /
GSP31yuktdipu:1575: yadā svayameva gāṃ gavayaṃ copalabhya vikalpayati yathāyaṃ tathāyamiti tadā tasyārthasya pramāṇāntareṇādhigatatvāt pramāṇameva tanna bhavatīti
GSP31yuktdipu:1581: śravaṇādyathā guḍaśabdaṃ śrutvā mādhuryamaśabdakaṃ pratipadyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1586: tatra vyabhicāriṇī yathā sāvayavamanityamityukte 'rthādāpannaṃ niravayavaṃ nityamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1588: yā tvavinābhāvinī avyabhicāriṇī yathā kesarivarāhayorupagahvare sannipātamupalabhyottarakālaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:1589: kevalaṃ kesariṇaṃ varāhavraṇāṃkitaśarīraṃ prayāntamupalabhya pratipadyate jito varāha iti tadanumānam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1591: tatra yadā kesariṇo jayamupalabhyāvyabhicāriṇamitarasya parājayaṃ pratipadyate kimanyatsyādṛte 'numānāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1592: adhigatobhayasambandhisamudāyasya hi pratipattuḥ pratyakṣībhūtānyatarasambandhino yā sambandhyantarapratipattistadanumānam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1594: sambhavo nāma droṇaḥ prastha ityukte 'rdhadroṇādīnāṃ sannidhānamavasīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1598: tatra droṇa ityukte yadatyantasahabhuvāṃ tadavayavānāmanyaśabdavācyānāmapi sannidhānam tadarthāpattireva /
GSP31yuktdipu:1600: abhāvo nāma tadyathā dhūmasya bhāvādagnerbhāvaḥ pratīyate evaṃ dhūmābhāvādagnyabhāva ityayaṃ pratidvandvisāhacaryakalpanayārthāpattirabhihitaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:1601: tatra yadā vyabhicārasāhacaryakalpanā tadā pramāṇābhāva eva /
GSP31yuktdipu:1603: yatra tu kvacidekāntaḥ syāt yathākṛtakatvānnitya iti tatrānumānam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1607: tadyathā gehe nāsti caitra ityukte bahirastīti sampratyayo bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:1609: katham ? yathaiva hi divā na bhuṅkte devadattaḥ pīna ityatrābhojanapratiyogino meduratvasyopalambhāddivāpratiyogini
GSP31yuktdipu:1610: kāle rātrau bhujiravasīyate evamihāpi gehābhāvābhidhānasāmarthyāttatpratiyogini viparyayaḥ kalpyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1611: anyathā tu yadyabhāva evābhipretaḥ syānnāsti caitra eveti brūyāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1616: kasmāt ? yasmād bhojanecchādisahacaro hi vyāpāro 'nuṣṭhīyamāno yadi sahacāriṇaṃ gamayati tadā nānumānātpṛthagiti śakyaṃ pratijñātum /
GSP31yuktdipu:1619: āha, yo 'yamanādau saṃsāre devamanuṣyatiraścāmabhinne 'rthe bāhye stryādau pratyaye
GSP31yuktdipu:1624: yena hi yo 'rtho 'bhyastassukhāditvena tasya vināpi tenārthena śabdamātrāt pratipattirutpadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1625: tadyathā vyāghro 'tra prativasatītyukte vināpi bāhyenārthenābhyāsavaśādeva svedavepathuprabhṛtayo bhavanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1631: yadi pūrvābhyāsavāsanāpekṣaḥ pratyayaḥ pratibhetyupagamyate tena tarhi asau pratyakṣamanumānamāptavacanaṃ cetyetadāpannam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1632: kasmāt ? yato na dṛṣṭādivyatirekeṇa pratyakṣarūpaṃ kadācidapyupalabhāmahe /
GSP31yuktdipu:1635: astyārṣo hi dṛṣṭādivyatirekeṇa sarvapadārtheṣu sāṃsiddhikaḥ pratyayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1643: na hi yogināmapramāṇapūrvakaṃ jñānamiti yathā tathā vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1647: tadyathā santamase vrajato drāgiti vijñānamutpadyate - asti me pratīghāti dravyaṃ purastādūrdhvamavasthitamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1650: na hi tatra niścaya utpadyate idaṃ taddravyamasti purato vā vyaktamastīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1653: yadi caivaṃjātīyato 'pi pratyayaḥ pramāṇamabhyupagamyate tenānavasthā prāpnoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1656: kāmakrodhalobhayaviṣādadvārako vikalpaḥ samyaṅmithyā vā yasmādaneka utpadyate tasmānna laukikaḥ pratyayaḥ pratibhā /
GSP31yuktdipu:1660: sā tu mithyājñānatvātpramāṇatvena na parigṛhyate ityayamadoṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1661: tasmāt siddhaṃ dṛṣṭādivyatirekeṇa rūpāntaranupapatteḥ pratibhāyāḥ pṛthaganabhidhānam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1691: upāttaviṣayāṇāmindriyāṇāṃ vṛttyupanipāti sattvodrekādarajastamaskaṃ yatprakāśarūpaṃ tad dṛṣṭamiti yāvat /
GSP31yuktdipu:1704: viṣayanirbhāsā hi jñānasyotpattiḥ adhigamarūpāpi loke savyāpāreva pratīteti kalpanayā karaṇabhāvo 'bhyupagamyate na paramārthataḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1712: yathaiva hi ghaṭādayo 'rthā jñānamantareṇa na tadrūpā nātadrūpā iti na śakyaṃ pratipattum,
GSP31yuktdipu:1713: evaṃ jñānamapi puruṣapratyayamantareṇa na viṣayarūpaṃ nāviṣayarūpam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1714: tathā ca śāstram- “tatsaṃyogādacetanaṃ cetanāvadiva liṅgamiti” (ISk 20) vacanāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1720: āha- yadi hyadhyavasāyaḥ pramāṇaṃ kathaṃ laukikaḥ prayogo 'rthavān bhavati pratyakṣaṃ vastu iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1722: yathā prasthapramito vrīhirāśiḥ prasthaśabdavācyo bhavati evaṃ pratyakṣapramito 'rthaḥ pratyakṣaśabdavācyaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1724: yadi pratyakṣapramitatvādviṣaye pratyakṣaśabdastena tarhi anumāmapramito 'rtho 'numānamiti syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1728: yogināṃ ca dhyānabhūmikāsu viharatāmanumānāgamātītaṃ prātibhaṃ yadvijñānamutpadyate tadupasaṃkhyeyaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1736: na cāgnyādibhiḥ kaścidanumīyata ityatastulyaśabdavācyatā na bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1739: prativiṣayaṃ dṛṣṭamitīyatyucyamāne yāvatkiṃcit prativiṣayaṃ vartate 'nugrāhakatvenopaghātatvena vā tat sarvaṃ dṛṣṭamityetadāpadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1740: adhyavasāyagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣo bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1744: na cādhyavasāyādṛte yatkiṃcidviṣayaṃ pratipadyate tena kiṃcit pramīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1746: tadyathā- adhyayanādhikāre brāhmaṇā ānīyantāmityukte ya evādhīyante ta evānīyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:1748: evaṃ tarhi śrotrādīnāmanyatamamantaḥkaraṇaṃ cetyetad dvāradvāribhāvena catuṣṭayaṃ viṣayaṃ prati vartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1754: yadi punaḥ sarveṣāmeva pramāṇatvamabhyupagamyate tena yacchāstramekameva darśanaṃ khyātireva darśanamiti taddhīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1761: sarvasandeheṣu caitadupatiṣṭhate- vyākhyānato viśeṣapratipattirna hi saṃdehādalakṣaṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1767: āha- kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ yena nimittāviśeṣe 'pi śrotrādivṛtterevātra grahaṇaṃ prāpnoti,
GSP31yuktdipu:1774: tadyathā- gauranubandhyaḥ ajo 'gnīṣomīya iti vāhīko nānubadhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1775: āha- yadīyaṃ śrotrādivṛttireva pratyakṣamityabhupeyate ka evaṃ sati doṣaḥ syāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:1777: yogināṃ ca dhyānabhūmikāsu viharatāmanumānāgamatītaṃ prātibhaṃ yadvijñānamutpadyate tadupasaṃkhyeyaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:1784: adhyavasāyo dṛṣṭamitīyatyucyamāne mṛgatṛṣṇikālātacakragandharvanagarādiṣu api yo 'dhyavasāyastad dṛṣṭamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1797: sāmānye hi viṣayamātre 'dhyavasāyasya pratyakṣatvaṃ vidhāya viśeṣe liṅgaliṅgipūrvake 'numānaṃ śāsti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1799: yathā taddhi brāhmaṇebhyo dīyatāṃ takraṃ kauṇḍinyāyeti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1818: ucyate- na tarhīdaṃ pratigrahaṇamindriyaviśeṣaṇaṃ viṣayaṃ viṣayaṃ prati yo vartate tasmin yo 'dhyavasāyastad dṛṣṭamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1819: kintarhi- adhyavasāyaviśeṣaṇaṃ viṣayaṃ viṣayaṃ prati yo 'dhyavasāya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:1833: ucyate- astu tarhīndriyāṇāṃ prati viṣayagrahaṇaṃ viśeṣaṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1836: evaṃ tarhi prativiṣayādhyavasāyaśca prativiṣayādhyavasāyaśca prativiṣayādhyavasāya iti sarūpāṇāmekaśeṣaḥ kariṣyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1838: dvitīyenāntaraṅgasya prātibhasyeti rāgādiviṣayaṃ yogināṃ ca yadvijñānaṃ tat saṃgṛhītaṃ bhavatīti vyākhyātaṃ pratyakṣam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1846: yasya hi yat kāraṇaṃ sa loke tatpūrvaka ityucyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1855: tatra pūrvavat yadā kāraṇamabhyuditaṃ bhaviṣayattvaṃ kāryasya pratipadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1858: na hi meghodayo 'vaśyaṃ vṛṣṭeḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:1860: ucyate- yadi tarhi kāraṇaśaktiṃ sahakāriśaktyantarānugṛhītāmapratiyoginīṃ dṛṣṭvā kāryasya vyaktiṃ pratipadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1861: tadyathā yadā lauhadaṇḍādisādhanasampanne vyāpāravatā kumbhakāreṇādhiṣṭhitāṃ mṛdamupalabhya ghaṭasya,
GSP31yuktdipu:1863: śeṣavat- yadā kāryanirvṛtiṃ dṛṣṭvā kāraṇasadbhāvaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1867: na hi dvayasamāpattipūrvaka eva prāṇabhṛtāṃ prādurbhāvo,
GSP31yuktdipu:1869: ucyate- yadā tarhi prabhānuraṃjitamantarikṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā candrārkayorudayaṃ pratipadyate tadā śeṣavat /
GSP31yuktdipu:1872: na hi prabhānurāgo 'ntarikṣe candrārkanimitta eva bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1874: ucyate - yadā tu nadīpūraṃ dṛṣṭvā vṛṣṭiṃ pratipadyate tadā śeṣavat /
GSP31yuktdipu:1879: ucyate yadā tarhi parṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā śālūkaṃ pratipadyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:1880: aṃkuraṃ vā dṛṣṭvā bījamiti tadā śeṣavat /
GSP31yuktdipu:1885: tatra yadā prasaṃgināṃ himavilayanādīnāṃ deśakālaliṅgaiḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate tadā muktasaṃśayaṃ pratipattirbhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1893: sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ nāma yatraikadārthayoravyabhicāramupalabhya deśāntare kālāntare ca tajjātīyayoravyabhicāraṃ pratipadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1898: tadyathā kvacit sādhanavato mṛtpiṇḍād ghaṭaniṣpattimupalabhyānyatra sādhanavataḥ piṇḍāntarādghaṭāntaraniṣpattiṃ pratipadyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:1901: ucyate- yadā tarhi sahabhuvāmekasya viśiṣṭaguṇamupalabhya śeṣāṇāmapi tadvattvamanumīyate tadā sāmānyatodṛṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1902: tadyathā vṛkṣādekasya phalasya pākamupalabhya śeṣāṇāṃ vṛkṣāntarāṇāṃ ca pāko 'numīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1905: na hi sarveṣāṃ phalānāṃ tulyakālaṃ pāko bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1908: ucyate- yadā tarhi samudrādekamudababinduṃ prāśya śeṣasya lavaṇatānumīate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1909: sthālyāṃ vaikaṃ pulākamupalabhya śeṣāṇāṃ pāko 'numīyate tadā sāmānyatodṛṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1913: tatraivaṃ pramāṇe parikalpyamāne kāryakāraṇayostatsaṃghātānāṃ ca sukhaduḥkhamohasvabhāvopalambhāttanmātrāhaṅakārapradhānānāṃ samadhigamaḥ syāt
GSP31yuktdipu:1916: ucyate- yadā tarhi kvaciddharmeṇa dharmāntarasyāvyabhicāramupalabhyaikadharmopalambhādbhinnajātīye 'tyantānupalabdhasya dharmāntarasya pratipattistadā sāmānyatodṛṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1922: atrāpi ca deśāntaraprāptilakṣaṇāt kāryād gatilakṣaṇasya kāraṇasyādhigamaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1925: yatra hi niyamataḥ kāryeṇa kāraṇamadhigamyate taccheṣavaditi ayamasmadabhisandhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1949: dvitīyena manvādinibandhanānāṃ ca smṛtīnāṃ vedāṅgatarketihāsapurāṇānāṃ śiṣṭānāṃ nānāśilpābhiyuktānāṃ cāduṣṭamanasāṃ yadvacastatpramāṇamityetasiddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1952: evaṃ sati yaduktaṃ tantrāntarīyaiḥ śiṃśapādiśabdānāṃ nirvikalpamanumāne 'ntarbhāvastrilakṣaṇatvāditi tadayatnataḥ pratikṣiptaṃ bhavatīti vyākhyātāni pramāṇāni /
GSP31yuktdipu:1960: tatra yaduktametāvadbhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ sakalapadārthāvabodha iti etadayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1963: tatra satyameva pūrvavaccheṣavatī prāganubhūtasambandhaviṣayaphale iti kṛtvā na tābhyāmaśeṣapadārthādhigamo 'bhyupagamyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1966: katham ? yathā hi kṛtakatvānityatvayorghaṭe sahabhāvamupalabhyānyatra śabdādau kṛtakatvadarśanādanityatvamanumīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1971: yeṣāṃ tu śeṣavadeva sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ teṣāṃ tasya kāryadvāreṇa samadhigamahetutvāt puruṣasyāgrahaṇaprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:1973: yadyapi puruṣasya kāryābhāvastathāpi puruṣāvyaktamahadahaṅkāraviśeṣāṇāṃ sāmprate kāle svavṛttibhyasteṣāṃ grahaṇamityuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:1977: yadi vṛttyā grahaṇaṃ puruṣasya sūpapādamabhaviṣyat saṃhatapārārthyamācāryo hetutvena nāvakṣyat /
GSP31yuktdipu:1985: svarūpaṃ hi sādhanasya dvividham- sādhāraṇamasādhāraṇaṃ ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:1988: tatra yadā hetuḥ parapakṣamapekṣya yathārthena svarūpeṇa sādhyasiddhāvupadiśyate tadā vītākhyo bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1989: yadā tu svasādhyādarthāntarabhūtānāṃ prasaṃgināṃ kṣepamapohaṃ kṛtvā pariśeṣataḥ sādhyasiddhāvapadiśyate tadāvītākhyo bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1990: tadyathā na cet paramāṇupuruṣeśvarakarmadaivakālasvabhāvayadṛcchābhyo jagadutpattiḥ sambhavati pariśeṣataḥ pradhānāditi tadā punaravītākhyo bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:1991: tatra yadā vīto hetuḥ svabuddhāvavahitavijñānasarūpaṃ vijñānāntaramādadhānena vaktrā pratipādyādau vākyabhāvamupanīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:1999: kutaḥ saṃśaya iti paryanuyuktaḥ pratyāha- anupalabhyamānasyobhayathā dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2009: atha nāstīti niścīyate tena sāmānyatodṛṣṭādanumānāttadvadanye 'pi padārthā na santīti
GSP31yuktdipu:2015: sādhyasya yadavadhāraṇamasti puruṣa iti sā pratijñā /
GSP31yuktdipu:2025: yastu tasya sādhyasahabhāvitvalakṣaṇaḥ prapañcaḥ so 'vayavāntarāṇītyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2027: tasya sādhanasya sādhyena sahabhāvitvanidarśanaṃ yadasau dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2036: yathā śayanādayaḥ saṃhatatvātparārthā evaṃ cakṣurādibhirapi parārthairbhavitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2040: tadyathā- tasmādasti puruṣa ityeṣāmavayavānāṃ parasparasambandhādviśiṣṭārthaḥ samudāyo vākyamityupadiśyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2041: vākyamapyanekaṃ yadā guṇībhūtasvārthamarthāntaropakāritvāditareṇa saṃsṛjyate tadā śāstramapyekaṃ vākyamityavasīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2045: yathā hi svayamutpadyate niścetuḥ pratyayastathaivānyaḥ pratyāyya ityetannyāyyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2046: na ca svayamevārthaṃ pratipadyamānasya jijñāsādīnāṃ tatra vyāpāraḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2057: tadbhāve bhāvāditi cet syādetat satsu jijñāsādiṣu tattvādhigamaṃ prati pravṛttirbhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:2067: yadi sādhyāvadhāraṇaṃ pratijñetyucyate tena sādhyasya hetordṛṣṭāntasya vā yadavadhāraṇaṃ tadapi pratijñā prāpnoti,
GSP31yuktdipu:2073: yo hi sādhanasamāsavacanaṃ heturityetallakṣaṇamācaṣṭe tena prāksādhanamabhidheyaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2074: tato vaktavyamamuṣya samāsavacanaṃ heturiti na caivamuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2077: yadi hi samāsagrahaṇaṃ kriyate kiṃ prāptaṃ yo 'yamādhyātmikānāṃ bhedānāṃ kāryakāraṇātmakānāṃ caikajātisamanvayo dṛṣṭa ityevamādiḥ sādhanaprapañcaḥ so 'heturityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2085: kasmāt ? tasya dvidhā bhinnasya pañcadhā sādhanabhāvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2088: tatrāpi vītaḥ pañcaprabhedaḥ ityataḥ samudāyānniṣkṛṣṭasyaikasya liṅgatvamaśakyaṃ vaktumiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2092: atra śabdo vā yena sādhyasādhane nidarśyete sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2095: na tadyadi tāvacchabdaḥ parigṛhyate tata upanayalakṣaṇaṃ bādhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2096: kasmāt ? na hi yathābhidhānaṃ tathā sādhyamityekakriyā yujyate iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2101: ucyate- yaducyate svaniścayenāṅgabhāvagamanātparapratyāyanārthaṃ jijñāsādyanabhidhānamiti atra brūmaḥ- na, uktatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2103: sarvasya cānugrahaḥ kartavya ityevamarthaṃ śāstravyākhyānaṃ vipaścidbhiḥ pratāyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:2106: athaitadaniṣṭam- yaduktaṃ sandigdhaviparyastāvyutpannabuddhyanugrahārtho hi satāṃ viniścayaḥ śāstrakathetyasya vyāghātaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2109: kintarhi yadā prativādī paryanuyuṅkte- kiṃ jijñāsasa iti avaśyamabhidhānīyaṃ śabdamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2113: yastu na paryanuyuṅkte na taṃ pratyete vācyāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2114: kvacidānarthakyāt sarvatra prasaṅga iti cenna itareṣāmapi tatprasaṅgāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2116: tathā ca bhavatoktaṃ kasyacittu kiñcit prasiddhameva bhavatītyanyataroktirapi sādhanaṃ bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:2122: yo hi paryanuyuñjīta kiṃ prayojano 'yaṃ śakyo vāyamartha iti taṃ prati vācyametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:2126: kintarhi yaṃ pratyeṣāṃ pratipattāvaṅgabhāvagamanaṃ taṃ pratyetāni sādhanamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2127: yadapyuktaṃ sādhyābhidhāyinaḥ pratijñābhyupagamāddhetudṛṣṭāntayorapi tatprasaṅga iti ayuktametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:2129: yadyapi sādhyaśabdo 'yamaviśeṣeṇa siddhatvādarthāntaramācaṣṭe tathāpi yaṃ prati jijñāsāsaṃśayaprayojanaśakyaprāptayastasya vyudasya saṃśayaṃ sādhyasyāvadhāraṇaṃ pratijñā,
GSP31yuktdipu:2132: yadā tu jijñāsādayo hetau dṛṣṭānte vā bhavanti
GSP31yuktdipu:2133: tadā kiṃ kṛtakaḥ śabdo 'tha na kṛtako 'tha buddhirnityā kṣaṇikā veti bhavatyeva tadavadhāraṇaṃ pratijñā /
GSP31yuktdipu:2136: yathā sādhyavatvenepsitaḥ pakṣa iti pratijñālakṣaṇamācakṣāṇo bhavānna sādhyalakṣaṇamācaṣṭe, kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2138: evaṃ sādhanasamāsavacanaṃ hetulakṣaṇamācakṣāṇā vayaṃ na sādhanamācakṣmahe /
GSP31yuktdipu:2139: kasmāt ? sādhyate 'neneti kṛtvā sādhanamiti loke siddhatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2151: katham ? na hi samāsaśabdasyāyamartha iti kṛtvā /
GSP31yuktdipu:2158: yattūktamabhidheyasya vākyānavayavatvātpañcāvayavatvavirodha iti arthe 'sambhavācchabde kāryaṃ vijñāsyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2170: yathā vākyam evaṃ ca tadarthaśca mukhyau śabdārthau,
GSP31yuktdipu:2174: tathaikasya sādhanasya sādhyadharmatatsahabhāvitvalakṣaṇānāṃ śaktīnāmabhidhānaṃ hetudṛṣṭāntādināvayavāntaraṃ naḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2175: tatra yaduktaṃ pratijñāhetvarthābhidhānād dṛṣṭāntopanayanigamanānāṃ nāvayavāntaratvamiti etadayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2181: tatrānvayadinā svarūpeṇādhigate pradhānalakṣaṇe dharmiṇi parapakṣapratiṣedhamātreṇopasaṃhāre kriyamāṇe pariśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ bādhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2183: tena yathā hetuvirodhātparamāṇvadibhyo na vyaktamutpadyate tathā hetvabhāvāt pradhānādapi notpadyate iti śakyaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP31yuktdipu:2186: svarūpeṇa tu paricchinne dharmiṇi upasaṃhāro yathāvadavakalpyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2187: na cetparamāṇvādibhyo vyaktamutpadyate pariśeṣataḥ pradhānādeva vyaktamutpadyate iti yathoktebhyo 'nvayādibhya ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2190: yadi sāmānyatodṛṣṭādanumānātsarvaṃ parokṣamadhigamyate ityabhyupagamyate prāptamidaṃ yeṣāmapyarthānāṃ kāraṇāntarato 'nupalabdhisteṣāmapi tasmādeva grahaṇam / tadyathā-
GSP31yuktdipu:2206: yathā yathā tu viprakarṣaṃ pratipadyate praṇidhāya cakṣurgṛhyate tāvadyāvatkrameṇādarśanamupasaṃprāptaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2210: tathā girisaritsamudrasamīpavartinaṃ śravaṇapratighātinaṃ prāk śabdamupalabhya paścāttasminneva deśe śabdamagṛhṇānāḥ śravaṇopaghātamanumimate
GSP31yuktdipu:2215: etaduktaṃ bhavati- tasmādapi sāmānyatodṛṣṭādanumānādyanna siddhyati pratyakṣagrāhyamapi
GSP31yuktdipu:2219: yadi tarhyāgamaḥ pramāṇīkriyate tena pratiśāstraṃ ye 'bhiyuktāsteṣāṃ prāmāṇyamityavaśyamabhyupagantavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2222: tasmādbhiṣajeva bhavatā paropadeśaḥ prayukto nāsmānayaṃ prīṇāti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2230: yasya khalvapi yo viṣayastasya tasminviṣaye vaco 'ntareṇāpi sādhanaṃ pramāṇamityavaśyamabhyupagantavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2235: yathā kṛtakatvādidharmo 'nityatvādau viṣaye dṛṣṭastadabhāve cādṛṣṭa ityanitye 'rthe niścayamādadhāti evaṃ śabdo 'pi svārthe tajjātīye na dṛṣṭaḥ pratipattiheturbhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2254: tathā hi kṛtakatvāditi liṅgaṃ caṇḍālakāpālikairapi prayujyamānaṃ sāhacaryāpekṣaṃ niścayamādadhāti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2262: kālāntare tu svārthaṃ na pratyāyayati arthāntaraṃ ca praśaṃsati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2268: na hi pratyakṣābhimatasya liṅgina upalabdhau gavāderliṅgaṃ nopalabhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2282: na hi dhūmognerapakṛṣya śakyate 'psu vāyāvākāśe 'nyatra vā niveśayitum /
GSP31yuktdipu:2284: yatha vṛddhyādayaḥ śabdāḥ svārthābhyuccayādiṣu prasiddhā ādaikṣu viniveśyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:2286: sarvābhidhānaśaktitvācchabdasyādoṣa iti cet syānmataṃ sarvābhidhānaśaktiḥ śabdaḥ sarvābhidheyaśaktiścārthastayoḥ puruṣavyāpāreṇa śaktyavavacchedaḥ kriyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2290: tasmācchabdasya svābhāvikaḥ sambandho vaktrapekṣayā vyajyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2294: kasmāt ? na hi yathā vakrapekṣayā sarvārthasya sataḥ śabdasya śaktyavacchedastathā sarvārthaṃ liṅgaṃ vaktrapekṣayārthāntarādavacchidyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2295: yathā caikaḥ śabdo jagatyevamuditaḥ puruṣaviniyogāpekṣaḥ sarvamarthamabhidhātuṃ samarthastathaikaṃ liṅgaṃ kayācidyuktyā sarvārthapratyāyanasamartham
GSP31yuktdipu:2309: sā tu pramāṇaviṣayā na tu prameyaviṣayā /
GSP31yuktdipu:2316: yasya hi śabdasyārthaḥ pratyakṣato 'numānato vā nopalabhyate sa na pramāṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2321: tasmādyathā vibhurātmā sarvatra sukhādisambhavādityevamādayo bauddhaṃ prati dharmyasiddhatvādayo yathārthāstathā vedaśabdā api prāyeṇeti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2324: kā hyatra yuktiryadasmadādibhiranupalabhyamānārthaṃ pramāṇabhūtānāmapi vākyamayathārthaṃ syāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2328: tatra yadi śabdasya pramāṇāntarāpekṣaṃ yathārthatvamāśrīyate tena na kevalaṃ svargādayaḥ kiṃ tarhi śabdā evāpramāṇamiti prāptam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2329: anumānasya ca pramāṇāntaranirapekṣasya gamakatvābhyupagamādāgamasya tato 'rthāntaratvaṃ sutarāṃ prasajyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2330: tasmādyuktāgamavirodhina evaṃvidhā nāstikavādāḥ śreyo 'rthibhirdūrādapohyā iti sthitametat- anumānādasiddhaṃ vastu yattadāptāgamātsādhyamiti
GSP31yuktdipu:2331: evamasya trividhasya pramāṇasyaindriyikaṃ kāraṇāntarato 'nupalabhyamānaṃ ca prameyaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2350: ucyate- yattāvaduktaṃ anupalabdhau kāraṇāntarānupapatteḥ pradhānasyāsattvaprasaṅga iti, atrāstu /
GSP31yuktdipu:2366: evaṃ siddhe yatpratijñādvayaṃ karoti tat jñāpayatyācāryaḥ vītāvītābhyāmabhipretārthasiddhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2368: ekasmiṃśca viṣaye dvau prayuṃjānaḥ samuccayena siddhiṃ dyotayati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2370: yaduktaṃ tantrāntarīyaiḥ na pṛthakpratipattihetū vītāvītāviti tadiṣṭamevaṃ saṃgṛhītaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2382: āha, kiṃ punastatkāryaṃ yadbhavānpradhānasyāstitve liṅgamācaṣṭa iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2384: mahadādi tacca kāryaṃ prakṛtivirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ ca // ISk_8 //
GSP31yuktdipu:2385: taddhi mahadahaṃkārendriyaviśeṣāviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ pradhānena visadṛśaṃ sadṛśaṃ cetyupariṣṭātpravedayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2387: kiṃ punaradhikṛtyedamucyate prakṛtivirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ ca mahadādi kāryamiti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2389: etāni ca parasparavaidharmyasādharmyapratipattimantareṇa na śakyāni vijñātumityevamarthamidaṃ prastūyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2396: kutaḥ saṃśaya iti cet syānmatam- asaṅgatārthaṃ prakaraṇāntaramupakṣipyate bhavatā /
GSP31yuktdipu:2397: na cāvidyamānasambandhasya saṃśayasya prakaraṇāntare 'bhidhīyamānasya nirṇītiṃ sādhvīmācāryā manyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:2409: na hi naḥ kāraṇādarthāntarabhūtaṃ kāryamutpadyata ityabhyupagamaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2410: kiṃ tarhi viśvātmakānāṃ sattvarajastamasāmapagataviśeṣāviśeṣāḥ sanmātralakṣaṇopacayāḥ pratinivṛttapariṇāmavyāpārāḥ paramavibhāgamupasaṃprāptāḥ sūkṣmāḥ śaktayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2412: etasyāṃ kalpanāyāmasata utpattau kaḥ prasaṅga iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2413: etenaiva bāhyānāṃ tantvādikāryāṇāṃ paṭādīnāṃ sanniveśaviśeṣamātratvādasata utpattiḥ pratiṣiddhā boddhavyā /
GSP31yuktdipu:2417: yadi hi sanniveśaviśeṣamātratvaṃ kāryasya siddhaṃ syādata etadyujyate vaktum- tadabhyupagamādasadutpatteraprasaṅga iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2422: iha śrotrādīnāṃ viṣayabhūtasya tatsannidhānādavaśyaṃ grahaṇena bhavitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2423: yadi ca prāgutpatteḥ satkāryaṃ syāt tadapi śrotrādisannidhānāt gṛhyeta /
GSP31yuktdipu:2428: asti prāgutpatteḥ kāryasyānupalabdhikāraṇaṃ tasmādasya sato 'pyagrahaṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2456: na tu prāgutpatteḥ kāryasya kriyāguṇavyapadeśasambhavaḥ tasmādasatkāryam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2459: iha prāgvyāpāropakramāt kartārastasmātphalamupalipsamānāḥ kāryaviśeṣaniyatasāmārthyaṃ sādhanamupādāya vyāpriyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:2463: pariṇāmādyupapatterna doṣa iti cet syānmataṃ kāraṇasya pariṇāmavyūhasaṃśleṣavyaktipracayakṣaṇāndharmān yasmāt kartrādīni kurvanti nānarthakāni syuḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2468: pariṇāmo hi nāmāvasthitasya dravyasya dharmāntaranivṛttiḥ dharmāntarapravṛttiśca /
GSP31yuktdipu:2477: yadi satkāryaṃ syāt tena yaḥ kriyārthaḥ sādhanānāmādau parispandaḥ so 'nte 'pi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2478: vā yo 'nte virāmaḥ sa ādāvapi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2483: yadi satkāryaṃ syāt tena yathā niṣpannasyotpattidharmeṇābhisambandhaḥ tathā ādāvapi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2494: ucyate- yaduktaṃ dravyāntarabhūtasyāvayavino niṣpattipratijñānānna sanniveśaviśeṣamātratvāt satkāryamityatra brūmaha- tadasiddhiḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:2496: yadi tantvādibhyo dravyāntarabhūtasyāvayavino niṣpattiḥ syāt tena yathā tantukalāpe paṭastatraiva vā paṭāntaramāhitaṃ bhedenopalabhyate tathaivopalabhyeta
GSP31yuktdipu:2509: mahāparimāṇaṃ dravyamanyatrāhitaṃ samavāyāt bhedena nopalabhyate ityetasminnarthe paryanuyuktasya kaste dṛṣṭāntaḥ ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2511: vyāpte na grahaṇamiti cet syānmatamakāryakāraṇabhūtaṃ dravyaṃ satyapi sambandhe na dravyāntaraṃ vyaśnuta ityato bhedena gṛhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2519: vemādivat iti cet syādetat- yathā satyarthāntarabhāve vemādayo 'vayavinaḥ kāraṇam evaṃ tantavo 'pi /
GSP31yuktdipu:2537: sa hyavayaveṣu vartamānaḥ kṛtsneṣu vā vartate pratyavayavaṃ vā ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2541: yadanekeṣu vartate tasya kṛtsnādhāragrahaṇe sati grahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2553: tataśca yacchāstraṃ mūrtimatāmasamānadeśatvamiti tasya vyāghāto 'vayavaparimāṇaṃ ca prāpnoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2555: tataśca yacchāstraṃ dravyamanekadravyamadravyaṃ vā tasya hāniretāvatā cāsya vṛttirbhavantī bhavet /
GSP31yuktdipu:2558: arthāntarāvasthāne 'rthāntarotpattivināśadarśanādanyatvamiti cet syādetat - vidyamāneṣu tantuṣu paṭo na bhavati saṃyogalakṣaṇasya kāraṇāntarasyānutpatteḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:2587: te cāpi cānarthānatve sati senādiṣu dṛṣṭāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2600: yo hi yathā kuṇḍe badarāṇyarthāntarabhūtānyāhitāni tathā kāraṇe kāryamastītyetadācaṣṭe taṃ pratyayamupālambhaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2608: tatha tantvādīnāmapi bhāvānāṃ kāraṇābhimatā kāryābhimatā cāvasthā krameṇa vā sthiraśca bhavat tannimittastadgrahaṇāgrahaṇavikalpaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2613: kāryakāraṇapṛthaktvavādinastatkriyāguṇānāṃ pṛthaktvamanumātuṃ yuktamityatastantvavasthāne paṭakriyāguṇagrahaṇādanumānābhāva ityayamupālambhaḥ sāvakāśaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2614: asmākantu kāraṇamātrasyaiva saṃghātādākārāntaraparigrahādvā kriyāguṇānāṃ pracitirvyaktiviśeṣo bhavatīti bruvatāmadoṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2622: vipratipattau hi satyāṃ liṅgataḥ prāgutpatteḥ kāryasya samadhigamaṃ kariṣyāma iti prakṛtamevaitat /
GSP31yuktdipu:2625: karmaguṇā aguṇā iti vacanādutpannamātraṃ dravyaṃ niṣkriyaṃ nirguṇamavatiṣṭhate iti vaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2630: dṛṣṭāntaviruddhamarthaṃ pratijñāya pratiṣidhyamānena siddhabuddhiviṣayatā smartavyetyetasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ sarvavivādasiddhiprasaṃgaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2638: yadyubhayapakṣaprasiddhasyāsataḥ kriyāyogaḥ syāt ata etadyujyate vaktum kārye sati kartuḥ prayāso 'narthaka iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2641: hetvabhidhānādasiddhiriti cet syādetat- yathā niṣpannatvānmadhvādīnāṃ dhāraṇasamartho
GSP31yuktdipu:2642: ghaṭo na kriyata ityayamapadiṣṭo heturasmābhiḥ evamitthaṃ kāryasyāsataḥ kāraṇaṃ nopapannamiti noktaṃ bhavatā /
GSP31yuktdipu:2646: taddhi kriyamāṇaṃ sati vā sambandhe kārakaiḥ kriyate 'sati vā ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2652: pravṛttikāle kartrādīnāṃ kriyāguṇavyapadeśābhāvādavastubhūtaṃ śaśaviṣāṇasthānīyaṃ vaḥ kāryam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2654: atha niṣpattikāle 'bhisambadhyate yaduktaṃ sato niṣpannatvātkriyānutpattiriti tasya vyāghātaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2655: atha matamasatyapi sambandhe niṣpattirbhavatīti tena kārakavyāpāravaiyarthyaprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2656: prāgapi ca kārakopādānātkāryaniṣpattiprasaṅga iti / uktaṃ ca
GSP31yuktdipu:2660: āha, nanu ca madhyame kāle kartrādibhiḥ kāryaṃ kriyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2661: kaḥ punarasau madhyamaḥ kāla iti ? āha-
GSP31yuktdipu:2664: yadā hetavaḥ pravṛttārambhā bhavantyuddiśya kāryaṃ na ca tāvannaimittikasyātmalābhaḥ saṃvartate sa madhyamaḥ kālaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2669: sadasadrūpā cāvasthā nāsti yo madhyamaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2672: pūrvadoṣāparihārāduddiśya kāryaṃ tasyātmano lābhātmakena saha sambandha iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2674: tasmāccitramapi vākyaṃ prasārya na kiṃcitparihṛtaṃ bhavatā /
GSP31yuktdipu:2675: tasmādyuktametat satyasati vā sambandhe doṣaprasaṃgādasanna kriyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2676: yasya punaḥ satkāryaṃ tasya doṣo nāsti / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:2680: tasmācca nārthāntaraṃ kāryam ityataḥ kāraṇenābhisambaddhānāṃ kārakāṇāṃ kāryeṇaiva sambandho bhavatītyadoṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2681: āha- nanu ca yasyāpi satkāryaṃ tasyopādānādarthāntaraṃ tatkāryaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2692: upādānasāmānyādvemādivadarthāntaraṃ paṭastantubhya iti brūvato 'rthāntaratvasāmānyāttantuvatsarvasmātkāraṇātkāryasya sambhavaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2695: kiṃcānyat, jātibhedaprasaṃgādarthāntarārambhaprasaṅgācca upādānasāmānyādvemādivadarthāntaraṃ paṭastantubhya iti brūvato yathā vemādibhyo bhinnajātīyo
GSP31yuktdipu:2696: tathā tantubhyaḥ paṭaḥ syāt yathā cāvasthite paṭe vemādayaḥ paṭāntaraṃ kurvanti tathā hyavasthite paṭe tantavo 'pi paṭāntaramārabheran /
GSP31yuktdipu:2721: yadyatrāsti tatra tadarthamupādīyate iti pūrvaṃ bhavatātisṛṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2722: idānīṃ tvavagamavigamārthaṃ sato 'pyupādānamiti brūvato mārgāntaragamanaṃ pūrvavādatyāgo 'naikāntikasya cāparihāra iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2726: sato dharmāntarasya nirodhamasataścotpattiṃ pariṇāmamabhidadhato vyaktamayamupālambhaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2728: kiṃ tarhi sādhanānugṛhītasya dharmiṇo dharmāntarasyāvirbhāvaḥ pūrvasya ca tirobhāvaḥ pariṇāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2730: vyūhasaṃśleṣavyaktipracayāstu kimasato dharmā uta svato 'santa iti vicāryam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2732: yadi tāvadasato dharmāḥ yathā kasyeti vācyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2741: upetya vaiṣāmutpattiṃ brūmaḥ- yadi hi pariṇāmavyūhasaṃśleṣavyaktipracayamātraṃ kāryamiṣyate yaduktaṃ dravyāṇi dravyāntaramārabhanta iti tasya vyāghātaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2745: katham ? ātmabhūtaṃ hi tantūnāṃ paṭākhyaṃ vyūhasthānīyaṃ sanniveśaviśeṣaṃ yadā kārakāṇi
GSP31yuktdipu:2746: svena svena vyāpāreṇāviṣkurvanti tadā kriyate utpadyate jāyata ityevamādirlokasya
GSP31yuktdipu:2748: yadā tu kārakāṇi śaktyantarāvirbhāvātsaṃsthānāntareṇautsukyavartitāmavasthāmupasaṃharanti tadā prāgupalabdhaṃ saṃsthānaṃ vināśaśabdavācyatāṃ pratipadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2752: sadasadviṣayaṃ janmeti vivāde 'nuṣakte janmaśabdaḥ prāgabhūtasya sadbhāvamācaṣṭa iti brūvato 'nuktasamam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2753: puruṣādāvadṛṣṭatvādasiddhiriti cet syādetat yadi tarhi kriyate utpadyate jāyata ityeṣorthaḥ sadviṣayaḥ kalpyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:2759: yadā bhāvaḥ svato 'narthāntarabhūtaṃ saṃsthānaṃ bhajate tadaite śabdāḥ pravartanta ityuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2760: dṛṣṭaṃ ca loke tadyathā muṣṭigranthikuṇḍalāni karoti janayatyutpādayati,
GSP31yuktdipu:2762: ubhayapakṣaprasiddhe tu śaśaviṣāṇādau naite śabdāḥ pravartante /
GSP31yuktdipu:2772: āsti cāyaṃ paṭasya vemādīnāṃ ca niyamaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2774: sahakārivattanniyama iti cet syānmatam yathāpo bījāṅkurasyotpattau samarthā bhavanti na kāṣṭhādagnervā /
GSP31yuktdipu:2777: yathā ca sūryaḥ sūryakāntādagnimutpādayituṃ samartho na candrakāntācca pānīyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2779: tathā ca tattvādīnāṃ paṭasyaiva śaktiniyamaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2780: na ca paṭasya tantuṣu sattvaṃ syāditi /
GSP31yuktdipu:2788: yattūktamapāṃ vicchinnavānna tāsvaṅkuro 'stīti tatrāpi yāsāmapāṃ bījānupraveśadaṅkurabhāvena vipariṇāmastābhyastasyānanyatvaṃ sādhyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2792: tadyathā vijñānotpattihetutve sati na rūpaṃ dṛṣṭamiti nedānīṃ tatsāmānyāt rūpamapyarūpaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2793: evaṃ paṭakāraṇatvādvemādayo na paṭa iti nedānīṃ tantavopyapaṭaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2799: kāraṇāntarātkāryotpattidarśanādanyatra tadbuddhiriti cet syānmataṃ prākkāraṇāntarātkāryāntarasyāsata utpattimupalabhya paścātkāraṇāntare kāraṇabuddhirbhavatīti
GSP31yuktdipu:2810: asattvāviśeṣe 'pi paṭasya kāraṇamasti na śaśaviṣāṇasyetyatra heturanuktaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2812: yathā tulyatve sattve paṭasya kāraṇamasti na puruṣasya,
GSP31yuktdipu:2817: saṃsthānavattadviśeṣa iti cet syānmataṃ yathā sattvāviśeṣe paṭaḥ saṃsthānaṃ na puruṣa evamasattvāviśeṣe paṭaḥ kāryaṃ na śaśaviṣāṇamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2824: tadupapattau vā sattvaprasaṃga iti / āha ca-
GSP31yuktdipu:2831: “tantuṣveva tathāstheṣu paṭa ityādibuddhayaḥ” ityevamādinā nyāyenāvayavipratiṣedhātsaṃyogo 'pi na saṃyogibhyasteṣāmarthāntaramiṣṭaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2832: tatraitāvatī parikalpanā syāt- yaduta tantusaṃyogo vā paṭaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:2839: yathā cāsatkāryaṃ na saṃbhavati tathā caśabdātsadasatkāryamapi /
GSP31yuktdipu:2842: kasmāt ? sattve hetvabhidhānānniścitaḥ prāgutpatteḥ kāryasya sadbhāvaḥ // 9 // @-----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31yuktdipu:2846: mahadādi tacca kāryaṃ prakṛtivirūpaṃ sarūpaṃ ceti vacanādvairūpyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2849: adhigatasārūpyasya hi sukhaṃ vairūpyasya pratipattirbhavatīti prāksārūpyagrahaṇaṃ kartavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2850: yathā tantrāntarīyāṇāṃ sadanityaṃ dravyavatkāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣavaditi dravyaguṇakarmaṇāmaviśeṣasāmānyamuktvā
GSP31yuktdipu:2861: vicchinnaṃ hi vairūpyamatastatpūrvamabhidhāya prakaraṇāṅgaṃ sārūpyaṃ sukhamabhidhātumityevamarthamācāryeṇaivaṃ kriyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2862: kathaṃ sārūpyasya prakaraṇāṅgatvamiti cet traiguṇyābhidhānadvāreṇa guṇalakṣaṇopadeśāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2870: āha- yadi tarhi bhavānprāgvairūpyābhidhānaṃ nyāyyaṃ manyate tadvaktavyaṃ kiṃ punaridaṃ vairūpyamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2889: ete hetumadādayaḥ paratantrāntā nirapavādāḥ vyaktasyāsādhāraṇā pradhānapuruṣābhyāṃ dharmāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2891: vyaktāvyaktapuruṣāṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ heturastīti aviśeṣa evāyaṃ paṭhitavyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2893: yadyapi vyaktāvyaktapuruṣāṇāmaviśiṣṭaṃ hetumattvaṃ tathāpi viśiṣṭasya kārakasya hetoḥ parigrahaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2894: sa ca vyaktasyaiva nānyasyeti nāyamaviśeṣo bhaviṣyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:2898: sāmānyaśabdāśca nārthaprakaraṇaśabdāntarābhisambandhamantareṇa viśeṣe 'vatiṣṭhanta iti viśeṣa upādeyaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2902: iha yaḥ sarvasaṃbhavī dharma ekaviṣaya upādīyate tasmātprakarṣo vijñāyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2903: tadyathā bhoktā māṇavaka ityukte sarveṣāṃ bhoktṛtvasya saṃbhavādevaṃ vijñāyate prakarṣeṇāyaṃ bhokteti,
GSP31yuktdipu:2915: utpādyavyaṅgyayorhi vināśaṃ paṭādiṣu dṛṣṭatvāt avyabhicārāttantrāntarīyā manyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:2920: antato vināśe 'pi na kaścidarthaḥ śabdabuddhibhyāṃ na vyajyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:2923: tathā ca saṃskṛtamapyevaṃ kalpyamāne vināśi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2926: yathaiva hi nāsata utpattirastyevaṃ sato 'pi vināśena na bhavitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2927: atha sato 'pi vināśo 'bhyupagamyate tena pralayakāle vinaṣṭānāṃ tattvādīnāṃ praścādasatāmutpattiḥ satkāryavādaṃ nirākuryāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:2932: kāraṇānāṃ tu yaḥ parasparaṃ saṃsargāt saṃsthānaviśeṣaparigrahastasya virodhiśaktyantarāvirbhavādvyaktistirodhīyata ityetad vināśaśabdena vivakṣitam
GSP31yuktdipu:2933: tathā ca vārṣagaṇāḥ paṭhanti- “tadetat trailokyaṃ vyakterapaiti,
GSP31yuktdipu:2936: sa tu dvividhaḥ- ā sargapralayāt tattvānāṃ kiñcitkālāntarāvasthānāditareṣām” iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2940: teṣāṃ pratiṣedho vaktavyo vā na vaktavyaṃ dvividhamanityamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2947: asti cānte kṣayaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ tasmāt kṣaṇikāḥ ucyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:2956: yadi hi avinaṣṭāyāṃ jvālāyāmindhanāntarāle jvālāntaramutpadyeta vṛddhirapi syāt,
GSP31yuktdipu:2960: yadāśrayā jvālotpattistadutpadyamānaivāsau niruṇaddhīti na yuktamasyā vināśrayeṇāvasthātum /
GSP31yuktdipu:2967: katham ? tasyāpi yadi vināśo na syāt,
GSP31yuktdipu:2971: pāṇyupaghātajo hi śabda utpatterūrdhvaṃ na bhavatīti pratyakṣasiddham /
GSP31yuktdipu:2980: tatra yaduktaṃ sādhyatvāt pradīpajvālābuddhiśabdādīnāṃ kṣaṇikatvasya na saṃskārāḥ kṣaṇikā ityetadayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2986: sa tu vināśa ekakṣaṇamavasthitānāṃ jvālānāṃ bhavati na punaḥ kṣaṇadvayamityetadapramāṇakamājñāmātrañca gṛhītaśikṣākaḥ kaḥ pratipattumutsaheta
GSP31yuktdipu:2990: kiṃ tāvadyasya dvaidhībhāvo dṛṣṭastadakṣaṇikamāhosvid yasya na dṛṣṭastat kṣaṇikamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:2991: kiñcātaḥ ? tadyadi tāvadevamabhyupagamyate yasya dvaidhībhāvastadakṣaṇikamiti tantorakṣaṇikatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:2992: atha mataṃ yasya dvaidhīkaraṇaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ tat kṣaṇikamiti yathā kimatrodāharaṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:2997: yattūktaṃ niyamadarśanānna vyaṅgyaḥ śabda iti tadayuktam, anekāntāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3005: tadyathā- cakṣuṣo rūpasya ca deśabhede 'pi vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:3008: buddhestu svādhikāra eva kṣaṇikatve heturiti karaṇo (kāraṇam ?) vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3009: tatra yaduktamante kṣayadarśanāt pradīpajvālābuddhiśabdavat kṣaṇikāḥ saṃskārā ityetadayuktamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3010: āha- itastarhi pradīpādīnāmanyeṣāṃ ca bhāvānāṃ kṣaṇikatvam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3012: naṣṭaścedartho 'bhyupagamyate nanu prāptamidamutpannamātrasyāsya vināśavighno nāstīti kauṭasthyaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ prāptamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3016: sati vinaśvaratve saṃskāropayoge tu sthityapabhraṃśa ityato 'sti kiñcitkālamavasthānaṃ bhāvānām /
GSP31yuktdipu:3024: kāraṇāvasthānāt na doṣa iti cet- syānmatam,
GSP31yuktdipu:3030: prāguktaṃ yena naṃṣṭavyamasau mantrauṣadhaprayogairapi kṣaṇādūrddhvaṃ nāvatiṣṭhate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3031: sāmprataṃ tu naṃṣṭrī santatiḥ kāraṇavaśādeva tiṣṭhatīti so 'yaṃ pūrvahetutyāgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3048: sa tu hetumattvena kathaṃ virotsyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3054: kṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ ca te ghaṭādayo na bhavanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3056: tatsadṛśotpatteradoṣa iti cet syādetat - utpattisamakālaṃ nirodhe 'pi ghaṭasyānyasya tādṛśasyotpattirbhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:3062: syādetadevaṃ yadi tadānīṃ sadṛśotpattau kāraṇaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3077: iha ghaṭād ghaṭe nirvṛttirna prasiddhā loke /
GSP31yuktdipu:3079: buddhiśabdavaditi cet syādetat yathā buddhirbuddhyantaraṃ sadṛśaṃ sūte,
GSP31yuktdipu:3082: kasmāt ? siddhaṃ hi buddherbuddhyantaraṃ śabdācca śabdāntaraṃ jāyata ityetadapyasmākaṃ prasiddham /
GSP31yuktdipu:3084: tatra yaduktaṃ sadṛśotpatteḥ so 'yamiti grahaṇamavicchinnaṃ kṣaṇikatve 'pi bhāvānāmityetadayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3087: yadā na kāraṇamasti na tadā kāryamutpadyate dvayorghaṭayoryugapadupalabdhiprasaṅgāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3088: yadā tu kāryamutpadyate tadā kāraṇaṃ niruddhamiti nirbījaḥ pradurbhāvaḥ prāpnoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3091: anutpanne hetusāmarthyādadoṣa iti cet syāttadanutpanne kārye kāraṇena prayojanam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3097: aṃga tāvat aṇuśo vibhajyatāmagnau vā kṣipyantām,
GSP31yuktdipu:3101: yugapatkāryakāraṇayorutpattinirodhau tulānatonnatavaditi cet syādetadyathā nāmonnāmau tulāntaryā (?)
GSP31yuktdipu:3106: tulyā tasya hyekasyāvanatiravasthā tad dvitīyasyonnataye heturbhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:3110: viśeṣagrahaṇāt kṣaṇikatvasiddhiriti cet syānmatam- yadyutpannamātroparatirnāsti bhāvānāṃ,
GSP31yuktdipu:3111: kiṃkayutaḥ śarīrādīnāṃ prāṇāpānaśramarūpādikṛto 'bjāśmaprabhṛtīnāṃ ca śītoṣṇasparśakṛto bhedaḥ ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3122: ********************** Here in the Ms, a considerable portion is left blank and it is apparent that discussion on the karikas 11 and 12 has been left out ********************** @----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31yuktdipu:3124: sattvaṃ laghu prakāśakamiṣṭamupaṣṭambhakaṃ calaṃ ca rajaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3128: yat kiṃcitkāryakaraṇe laghu prakāśaṃ ca tatsattvarūpamiti pratyavagantavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3143: yatkiṃcid gauravaṃ varaṇaṃ copalabhyate tattamorūpamiti pratyavagantavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3147: ityeṣa sattvādīnāmavyatikareṇa svabhāvopalambho yata eṣāṃ nānātvamavasīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3150: rūpāntarasya vā sata utpattiriti atra brūmaḥ na,
GSP31yuktdipu:3152: iha guṇabhūtasya bhaktitaḥ pradhānopakāritve sati bhaktitastadrūpopapattirdṛṣṭā /
GSP31yuktdipu:3154: taddhi mukhādiṣu dṛṣṭapratilabdhapravṛttiḥ pittasya svena rūpeṇāṅgabhāvaṃ gacchaṃstasyopakārāttiktaṃ saṃpadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3156: sattvamapi straiṇaguṇabhūtaṃ sapatnīrajasaḥ svena rūpeṇāṅgabhāvaṃ gacchaṃstasyopakārādduḥkhaṃ saṃpadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3158: evaṃ kṣātraṃ rajaḥ āryadāralakṣaṇasya sattvasya dasyulakṣaṇasya ca tamasaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3159: evaṃ medhyaṃ tamaḥ kārṣike sattvasya proṣitadayitāyāśca rajasaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3163: yadā caite 'ṅgabhāvamapagacchanto madhyasthāstulyasaṃskārāśca pratipadyante tadā svarūpeṇaiva /
GSP31yuktdipu:3168: yathoktaṃ tatra kathamidamekāntena niścīyante guṇabhāvātsattvādīnāṃ rūpāntaragrahaṇaṃ na punastādrūpyādeveti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3170: yadi straiṇaṃ sattvaṃ tādrūpyādeva sapatnyā tena gṛhyate tena bharturapi tathā grahaṇaprasaṃgo madhyasthānāṃ tulyasaṃskārāṇāṃ ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:3174: uttarakālaṃ svarūpagrahaṇānnivṛttānuśayābhiścaikārthatāmupagatābhiḥ sapatnībhiḥ svenaiva rūpeṇa straiṇasya sattvasya grahaṇamupalabhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3182: ityatra brūmaḥ - asti cāyaṃ virodho guṇānāṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:3186: vṛttaya ekatra saṃmūrchitāḥ sahabhāvaḥ prakṛṣṭamapi kālamanubhavanti evaṃ sattvarajastamasāṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:3187: sati virodhe mahadādyekakāryasādhanabhāvopagatānāṃ vṛttaya ekatra mūrchitāḥ saha bhavantīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3188: yuktyabhāvādasiddhiriti cet syānmatam - kā punaratra yuktiryena virodhināmekakāryatā bhavatīti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3190: guṇabhūto hi pratiyogī pradhānabhūtena tadupakarakatvānna virudhyata iti saṃsargeṇa varttitumutsahate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3191: tulyabalayostu dvayoḥ satyameva sahāvasthānasya nāsti sambandhaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3192: tathā ca bhagavān vārṣagaṇyaḥ paṭhati rūpātiśayā vṛttyatiśayāśca virudhyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:3201: yadi laghvādilakṣaṇabhedātsattvādīnāṃ nānātvaṃ mitho 'bhyupagamyate tena laghutvaprakāśatvayorapi bhedo 'sti guṇadvayaprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3202: evamupastambhacalatābhyāṃ gauravavaraṇābhyāṃ ca dvayaṃ dvayamiti ṣaḍguṇāḥ prāpnuvanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3203: atha mataṃ laghutvaprakāśayorabheda iti pṛthaganabhidhānaṃ prāptam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3204: tadbhede vā grahaṇabhedamanicchataḥ prāpto laghutvādibhede 'pi guṇābhedastathā caiko guṇa iti prāptam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3208: yadi hi rajaso 'ṅgabhāvamupagacchatsattvamupakārāttadrūpaṃ bhavati tena pratijñātasya rūpāntarasyopasaṃhārāttrairūpyaṃ guṇānāmekaikasya prāptam rūpāntarasya vā sata utpattiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3212: paramarṣerapi guṇānāṃ kāryameva pratyakṣaṃ na śaktimātreṇāvasthānamasaṃvedyatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3216: ucyate- yattāvaduktaṃ lakṣaṇabhedād guṇanānātvavādino lakṣaṇadvayayogādekaikasya guṇaṣaṭtvaprasaṃga iti tanna /
GSP31yuktdipu:3221: tadanarthāntaraṃ dharmāsta iti nāsti ṣaṭtvaprasaṃga iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3223: na hyetatkvacitprasiddham yathā yāvanto dharmāstāvanto dharmiṇa iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3227: athaitadaniṣṭaṃ na tarhi vaktavyaṃ lakṣaṇabhedād guṇānāṃ ṣaṭtvamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3231: na ca bhaktiḥ paramārtha ityasthāne yatnaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3234: tathā strīkṣatrameghāḥ prakṛtāsteṣvaṅgabhāvamagacchata iti vijñāyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3240: āha- avivekyādiridānīṃ gaṇaḥ kathaṃ pratipattavya iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3247: tatra viṣayatvamacetanatvaṃ prasavadharmitvaṃ ca na bhavatīti purastātpratipādayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3260: yadi kārye dṛṣṭasya dharmasya kāraṇe sadbhāvo 'bhyupagamyate prāptau hetumadādīnāmapi dharmāṇāṃ kāryadṛṣṭatvātpradhāne prasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3261: atha kāryopalabdhau tulyāyāṃ hetumadādayo neṣyante na tarhītareṣāmapi kāraṇāvasthitirastīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3265: katham ? yadi tāvaddhetumadādayo vyakte dṛṣṭatvātpradhāne vyañjante,
GSP31yuktdipu:3268: ahetumadādayaḥ pradhāne 'bhyupagamādvyakterapi prāpyante tādṛśāḥ kāraṇāsambhavātkāryameva tanna bhavatīti prāptam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3274: siddhe hi vyaktāvyaktayoḥ kāraṇatve etadevaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3284: avyaktasya tu sadbhāva evāsiddha ityayaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3286: kāryasya kāraṇapūrvakatvādvyaktasya ca kāryatvādavyaktasadbhāve pratipattiriti cet syādetat /
GSP31yuktdipu:3298: kāryaṃ cedavyaktamataḥ saṃśayaḥ kimindradhanurvadakasmādasya prādurbhāvo 'tha māyādivadasato 'tha kāraṇātsato ghaṭavaditi ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3306: // iti yuktidīpikāyāṃ sāṃkhyasaptatipaddhatau tṛtīyamāhnikaṃ prathamaṃ ca prakaraṇaṃ samāptam //
GSP31yuktdipu:3317: satyaṃ, sāmprate kāle mahadādayo yuktaparimāṇāḥ pratyakṣānumānopalabdheḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3321: idānīmetāvanto bhedā ityetacchakyamanumātum atītānāgatayostu kālayornāsti prasiddhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3324: mahadādīnāṃ ye bhedā devamanuṣyatiryañco ghaṭādayaśca teṣāmaśakyaṃ parimāṇaṃ paricchettum /
GSP31yuktdipu:3326: asti śarīrāṇāṃ mahābhūtasāmānyaṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ ca pṛthivīsāmānyaṃ,
GSP31yuktdipu:3333: tattvabhedena parimitā bhedā ityetadvivakṣitaṃ yathoktamasmābhiruktaṃ ca yadyasti tattvāntaramucyatām /
GSP31yuktdipu:3335: tathāvidhenāpi tu tena saṃvyavahāro na pratiṣidhyate iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3339: iha yena bhedānāṃ samanupagatistasya sattvaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3345: sukhādibhiḥ śabdādayo 'nugamyanta ityetadaprasiddham kena kāraṇena pratipattavyamiti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3347: iha śabdasparśarūparasagandhānāṃ sannidhāne svasaṃskāraviśeṣayogātsukhaduḥkhamohākārāḥ prāṇināṃ buddhaya utpadyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:3364: naiva brūmo yo yasya vikāraḥ sa tajjātīyaka iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3365: kiṃ tarhi yo yajjātīyakaḥ sa tasya vikāra iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3368: na caitadudāharaṇaṃ prasiddhaṃ agnyādayaḥ svakāraṇajātiṃ nānuvidadhatīta /
GSP31yuktdipu:3371: bherīvikāraḥ śabdo na tu yathā bherīrūpamavasthitam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3372: pradīpeneva tu daṇḍābhighātena vyajyata iti sādhyametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:3379: iha yāvatī kācilloke pravṛttirupalabhyate sā sarvā śaktitaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3380: tadyathā kumbhakārasya daṇḍādisādhanavinyāsalakṣaṇāyāśca śakteḥ sannidhānād ghaṭakaraṇe pravṛttirasti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3387: yadi śaktipūrvikā pravṛttiriti manyadhvaṃ tena yāvatpravṛttirnopalabhyate tāvacchaktirnāstītyetadāpannam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3389: yadi khalvapi vidyamānā śaktiḥ kenacitprabandhena kāryaṃ notpādayecchaktitaraśaktetyetadāpannam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3392: tatra yaduktaṃ prākpravṛtteḥ śaktidarśanādvyaktasyāpi niṣpādikā śaktirastītyetadayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3394: iha pradhānameva vā śaktiḥ syāt pradhānādvā bhinnā ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3396: tadyadi tāvatpradhānameva śaktistena kārye bhedācchaktibhedo 'vasīyata iti śaktibhedātpradhānanānātvaprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3399: atha mā bhūdayaṃ doṣa iti pradhānādarthāntarabhāvaḥ śaktīnāmabhyupagamyate tena bhinnānāṃ śaktīnāṃ pravṛttitaḥ siddhau pradhānasiddhirnāstītyetadāpannam
GSP31yuktdipu:3408: na ca kāryānupalabdhau kāryābhāva ityetalloke prasiddham /
GSP31yuktdipu:3409: yatpunaruktaṃ kāryaniṣpattau śakteḥ svarūpahānamiti atra brūmaḥ na,
GSP31yuktdipu:3413: na ca śakyate vaktuṃ pradīpasya prakāśanaśaktiraśakteti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3416: yattūktaṃ sahakāribhāvāntarasannidhānātpravṛttisamakālamevārthānāṃ śaktiprādurbhāva iti atra brūmaḥ- tadaprasiddhiḥ śaktyapekṣatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3417: iha sarvaḥ kartā svagatāṃ śaktimapekṣya tadyogyatayā sahakāribhāvāntaramupādatte,
GSP31yuktdipu:3421: yatpunaretaduktaṃ tāvadeva pradhvaṃsaṃ iti atra brūmaḥ na,
GSP31yuktdipu:3423: yadi pravṛttisamakālameva pradhvaṃsaḥ iti atra brūmaḥ na,
GSP31yuktdipu:3425: yadi pravṛttisamakālameva pradhvaṃsaḥ syātkāryaniṣṭhaiva na syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3430: athāpi syādekasyāṃ śaktau kṣaṇasādhyamaṃśamavasāya vinaṣṭāyāmanyattatsadṛśaṃ śaktyantaramutpadyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:3435: ko hyatra heturyena vināśasamakālamanyacchaktirūpaṃ kāryamavasīyayati na punaḥ prāktanamevāvasthitamiti ? kiṃ cānyat /
GSP31yuktdipu:3437: kṣaṇottarakālāvasthāne ca bhāvānāṃ yo doṣa upāttaḥ kauṭasthyaprasaṃga iti tasya parihāra uktaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3443: ko hyatra nirbandhaḥ tasyāṃ vinaṣṭāyāmanyā pravṛttyantaraheturbhavati naiva punaḥ saiveti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3446: tatra yenaiva hetunā ekaṃ ghaṭamavasāya na vinaśyati tenaiva yāvanti kartavyānīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3450: na tasya nānātvaṃ śaktyekatvaṃ vā prasajyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3462: yathaiva hi devadattādhārayā kriyayā tasya deśāntaraprāptimupalabhyātyantādṛṣṭaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:3468: kāraṇaṃ ca kāryaṃ ca kāraṇakārye tayorvibhāgaḥ kāryakāraṇavibhāgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3469: idaṃ kāraṇamidaṃ kāryamiti buddhyā dvidhāvasthāpanaṃ vibhāgo yaḥ sa kāraṇakāryavibhāgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3481: āha, kaḥ punarvyaktasya parasyaparasya kāryakāraṇabhāva iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3493: yo 'yaṃ guṇānāṃ prakāśapravṛttiniyamairitaretaropakāro 'bhyupagamyate sa khalu krameṇa vā syāt yugapadvā ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3497: yadi tāvatsattvaṃ pūrvaṃ guṇāntaranirapekṣaṃ svaśaktita eva prakāśate tayorupakārakamityāśrīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3498: tena yathā sattvamevamitarāvapyupakāranirapekṣau svakāryaṃ kariṣyata ityupakārānarthakyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3499: atha mā bhūdayaṃ doṣa ityato yaugapadyamāśrīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3505: iha sattvaṃ prakāśamānaṃ rajastamasorvidyamānaṃ vā prakāśamāviṣkuryāt avidyamānaṃ vā ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3509: yathā sattvasya prakāśaktirastītyatastad guṇāntaranirapekṣaṃ prakāśate tadvaditarāvapītyadoṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3511: tena yaduktaṃ prākpravṛttereva tiṣṭhante śaktaya iti tad hīnam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3515: tathā hi sattvādayaḥ parasparopakāriṇo na cāvasthitabhāvapūrvakāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3525: yeṣāṃ tu kāryamekaṃ sahabhāve tu teṣāmupakāro na pratiṣidhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3530: dṛṣṭaḥ khalu vegenordhvagamane vāyoraraghaṭṭādīnāṃ yugapadupakāraḥ na kaściddoṣaḥ tathā guṇānāmapi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3531: saṃyoganimitta iti cet sādhyaṃ kimarthāntarabhūtamuta prāptimātraṃ saṃyoga iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3535: vyaktiḥ na cāvidyamānayoratha caikakāryasiddhiryathā ca pṛthivyādīnāṃ parasparopakāritvaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:3540: tatra ye tāvatpradhānāvasthānubhāvino guṇāsteṣāṃ śaktimātrarūpatvādanirdeśyaprakāśādisvabhāvānāṃ nāsti tannibandhana upakāraḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3544: yadi guṇānāmādye prakope svasāmarthyādeva pūrvasmātpracyutistenottarakālamapi tadvadeva bhaviṣyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:3545: atha pradhānāvasthāyāmapi copakāro na tarhi nānaikāntiko heturiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3548: tadyathā sūkṣmo 'gniḥ sūkṣmaṃ prakāśaṃ svayameva karoti,
GSP31yuktdipu:3574: anvayadarśanāttadanupapattiriti cet syānmatam pradhānānvaya eva pṛthivyādiṣu sukhādilakṣaṇa upalabhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3575: yacca yenānvitaṃ tasyāsau vikāra iti yuktametatprāgapadiṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3587: kāraṇāntarapūrvakatve 'pi khalu vyaktasya śaktyāḥ parimāṇādayaḥ pūrvameva kalpayitum /
GSP31yuktdipu:3591: astitve hi paramāṇūnāmabhyupagamyamāne sati satyamevaṃ syādiyamāśaṃkā,
GSP31yuktdipu:3595: yattu khalvidamucyate pṛthivyādiṣu rūpādyupalambhādanvayadarśanādaṇūnāṃ sadbhāvaḥ pradhānavadeva kalpayitavya ityetadapi cānupapannam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3597: tanmātrapūrvakatve 'pi hi pṛthivyādīnāṃ kalpyamāne rūpādisattvādato na yuktametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:3599: athāpi syādyathā tanmātrāṇāṃ rūpādimattvaṃ kalpyate tatpūrvakatvaṃ ca pṛthivyādīnāṃ dṛśyamapi teṣu rūpādisattvaliṅgena paramāṇubhyo niṣkṛṣyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:3605: āha, yadi punastanmātrāṇāmeva paramāṇutvamabhyupagamyate ka evaṃ sati doṣaḥ syāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3609: kasmāt ? svakāryāddhi prathīyasī prakṛtirbhavatīti ca naḥ samayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3615: astu vā paramāṇūnāṃ sadbhāvastathāpi tebhyo jagadutpatterasambhavaṃ brūmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3620: tasmātsatyapi sadbhāve na teṣāṃ jagatkāraṇamiṣyate iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3622: yaddhi tatparamāṇūnāṃ kāraṇaṃ tadeva jagatkāraṇatvena yuktaṃ kalpayituṃ syāt na tanniṣādimatāḥ paramāṇavaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3623: kṛtakatvāsiddherayuktamiti cet syānmataṃ yadi paramāṇūnāṃ kṛtakatvaṃ prasiddhamata etadyujyate vaktumamuṣmāddhetorakāraṇaṃ paramāṇava iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3661: iha yayormadhye antarā dravyamavasthitam prāptervyavadhāyakaṃ bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:3665: yo yaḥ prāptervyavadhāyakaṃ tau kṛtakau tasmāttāvapi kṛtakau /
GSP31yuktdipu:3676: ataeva kṛtakatvamiti cet syānmataṃ yata eva yogināṃ pratyakṣāḥ paramāṇavastata eva kṛtakāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3678: asmadādipratyakṣaṃ ghaṭādi hi kṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kṛtvā /
GSP31yuktdipu:3688: yathā sattāguṇatvarūpatvādīnāṃ sati pratyakṣatve 'kṛtakatvam evaṃ paramāṇūnāṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3694: na hi paramāṇubhyaḥ sūkṣmataramanyad bhāvāntaramasti yadeṣāmārambhakaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3702: na ca yathā pradhānapuruṣāvevamaṇavo 'pi viśvaṃ vyaśnuvate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3705: yeṣāṃ tu kāryadravyaṃ pacyata iti pakṣasteṣāmayamanupālambha ityataḥ paramāṇusamavetaṃ karmodāhāryam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3706: taddhi sūkṣmamatīndriyaṃ kṛtakaṃ ceti siddhaṃ kṛtakāḥparamāṇavaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3715: caitanyāviśeṣādīśvarasyāpi sa eva vidhiḥ kāraṇatvapratiṣedhe boddhavyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3737: śaktimattvātsvata iti cet syātpunaretat sarvaśaktipracita īśvaraḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3738: tasya prāgapi pradhānavipariṇāmātsvata evecchāyogād buddhisadbhāvo na pratiṣidhyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3750: dṛṣṭāntaviruddhamarthamādāya pratibadhyamānena śaktiviśeṣaḥ smartavya ityetasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ sarvavādasiddhiprasaṃgaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3752: evaṃ svata īśvarasya buddhisambhavo na cedbhavet yuktamucyate prākpradhānapravṛtterbuddhyasambhavānna buddhimatpūrvako 'yaṃ kāryaviśeṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3754: dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ vā phalamuddiśya buddhimantaḥ kāryaviśeṣānprāsādavimānādīnārabhamāṇā dṛśyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:3773: yadyapīśvarapūrvako 'yaṃ kāryaviśeṣaḥ tathāpyādisarge sukhottarāṇāmasmadutpannānāṃ prāṇināṃ dharmādharmaparigrahād hīnamadhyamotkṛṣṭavayojātisvabhāvādiyogo bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:3780: yaduktaṃ sarvamīśvarabuddhipūrvakaṃ vyaktamiti tu tasya vyāghātaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3785: yo 'yaṃ cetanācetanayorgośakaṭayorabhisambandhaḥ sa kena cetanena kṛtaḥ ?
GSP31yuktdipu:3788: atha caitraśabdavācyasya piṇḍasyopadraṣṭā kṣetrajñaḥ tatkṛta iṣyate tadayuktam,
GSP31yuktdipu:3795: atha mā bhūdayaṃ doṣa iti svābhāvika īśvarasya kāryakāraṇayorabhisambandha iṣyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:3811: kāryakāraṇavattānabhyupagamādadoṣa iti cet vyāpī niravayavo 'nantaśaktiḥ sūkṣmebhyaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:3817: itthaṃ cedīśvaro yadidamanumānaṃ kāryaviśeṣasyātiśayabuddhipūrvakatvācca cetanācetanayorabhisambandhasya cetanakṛtatvāditi tadvyāhanyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3823: śrutirapi cāsya mūrtimācaṣṭe kṛttivāsāḥ pinākahasto vitatadhanvā nīlaśikhaṇḍītyādi /
GSP31yuktdipu:3827: kasmāt ? na hyasato mūrtimattvamupapadyata iti kṛtvā /
GSP31yuktdipu:3830: na hyekāntena vayaṃ bhagavataḥ śaktiviśeṣaṃ pratyācakṣmahe,
GSP31yuktdipu:3832: yathā tu bhavatocyate pradhānapuruṣavyatiriktaḥ tayoḥ prayoktā nāstītyayamasmadabhiprāyaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:3836: kurvāṇaḥ khalvapyayamabhisambandhaṃ śarīramātreṇa vā śarīriṇaḥ kuryāt,
GSP31yuktdipu:3856: kasmāt ? dvividhaṃ hi dravyaṃ anekadravyamadravyaṃ ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:3860: pṛthivyādīni manaḥparyantāni navaiva dravyāṇi vaḥ siddhāntaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3863: sati cāsya dravyatve vaiśeṣikaguṇanirdeśa ācāryeṇa kṛtaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3874: pratyakṣapūrvakatvādvā saṃjñākarmaṇa ityetasmālliṅgādīśvaraparigraha ācāryasya siddha iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3877: satyamanena liṅgenāsmadādibhyo viśiṣṭaśakteḥ kasyacideva māhātmyaśarīrasyānyasya vā pratipattiḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3878: saṃjñāmātraṃ tu yathā bhavadbhiḥ sarvakāraṇānāṃ sṛṣṭyupasaṃhārapravṛttiheturekaḥ svatantra iṣyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3882: īśvaraparatantre cedaṇūnāṃ pravṛttinivṛttī syātāṃ tameva prāgupadiśet /
GSP31yuktdipu:3887: na cāsya vadhvā iva śvaśuranāmasaṃkīrtane doṣopapattiḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3897: yathāntareṇa śarīraṃ karma notpadyamānaṃ dṛṣṭamevamantareṇa karma śarīrasyāpi kāraṇāntaramaśakyaṃ kalpayitumiti parasparanimittatvānnāsya parivartasya pūrvakoṭiḥ prajñāyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3907: yadyadhikāranimittā śarīrotpattirādisarge 'bhyupagamyate prāptamekena śarīreṇa sarvapuruṣāṇāmabhisambandho niyamahetvabhāvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:3915: apavarganiyamaprasaṃga iti cet syānmataṃ yadyadhikāramātravaśāccharīrotpattiḥ paramarṣerevāpavargasādhanaṃ śarīrādutpadyeteti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3917: kiṃ tarhi sarveṣāṃ guṇānāṃ prādhānyāttannimittāni śarīrāṇyādisarge sāṃsiddhikānyutpadyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:3918: tatra yasya sattvapradhānaṃ kāryakaraṇaṃ sa paramarṣiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3920: evaṃ guṇasamparkād guṇapradhānāpradhānabhāvena yāvatsthāvaraśarīraprādurbhāva ityato nāsti guṇānāṃ śarīraviniyogapakṣapātaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3927: na hi naḥ kālo nāma kaścidasti,
GSP31yuktdipu:3931: yadeva kṛtakaṃ tatraiva paramaparamityādiḥ pratyayo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3933: kvacitsāmarthādapākajavadadoṣa iti cet syānmatam- yathāgnisaṃyogaḥ pākajahetuḥ tathā cāviśeṣe 'pi pṛthivyāmeva pākajotpattinimittaṃ bhavati nākāśādiṣu /
GSP31yuktdipu:3934: evaṃ kālo 'pi parāparādiheturatha cānityeṣveva syānna nityeṣviti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3941: evaṃ yadi kriyābhyo 'nyaḥ kāla iṣyate kāraṇaparispandasya jagatkāraṇatvamathānyatsādhyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3944: sa ca kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ prekṣāpūrvakṛtānāṃ śayanādīnāmupalabdhau yādṛcchikeṣu cānupalabdhau na tasyā liṅgamiti śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP31yuktdipu:3947: na hi tata utpannānāṃ parimāṇamupapadyata ityato nāpyanvayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:3968: yatraitacchakyate vaktuṃ trayaḥ sattvādaya iti tadavasthānaṃ kāryārambhakamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3970: etaduktaṃ bhavati- kāryakāle guṇāḥ parityaktapūrvāvasthā bhedaṃ pratilabhya parasparopakāreṇa saṃhanyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3976: dvividhā hi kriyā praspandalakṣaṇā pariṇāmalakṣaṇā ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:3980: āha- nanu ca pariṇāmo 'pi saukṣmyātpradhānasya nopapadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3981: kasmāt ? na hi saukṣmyātsūkṣmasyākāśādervipariṇāmo dṛṣṭa iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3988: tattvādapracyuto dharmī pariṇāmaḥ sa ucyate // iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:3989: yadā śaktyantarānugrahātpūrvadharmān tirobhāvya svarūpādapracyuto dharmī dharmāntareṇāvirbhavati tadavasthānamasmākaṃ pariṇāma ityucyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:3992: ucyate- yathā pālāśaṃ palāśādapracyutanimittāntarasyātapāderanugrahācchyāmatāṃ tirobhāvya pītatāṃ vrajati tathedaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:3994: kathaṃ punaretavagamyate pālāśaṃ svarūpādapracyutaṃ dharmāntarasya parityāgamupādānaṃ ca karoti,
GSP31yuktdipu:3996: ucyate- kṣaṇabhaṅgapratiṣedhāt prāgeva kṣaṇabhaṅganirdiṣṭaṃ vinaṣṭānāṃ bhāvānāṃ punarutpattau nāsti kāraṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4000: tatra yadi dharmasya nivṛttirabhyupagamyate dharmiṇo 'pi nivṛttirananyatvātprāptā /
GSP31yuktdipu:4009: tatra yaduktaṃ dharmivināśe dharmavināśa iti etadayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4012: iha rūpādisāmānyaṃ vā dharmirūpatvena parikalpyamānaṃ parikalpyeta rūpādiviśeṣo vā ? kiṃ cātaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4015: yadi tāvatpṛthivī sāmānyaṃ ghaṭādirviśeṣastena pṛthivyapi tanmātrāpekṣayā viśeṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4019: tataśca yaduktaṃ svarūpādapracyuto dharmī dharmāntaraṃ vijahāti,
GSP31yuktdipu:4023: yattūktaṃ sāmānyaṃ sāmānyāntarāpekṣaṃ viśeṣatvamiti na pratyayanivṛttau sāmānyābhāvāvasthitestataśca dharmisvarūpasiddheḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:4024: yāvatpṛthivītyayaṃ pratyayo na nivartate sāmānyaṃ ghaṭādirviśeṣaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:4027: yadā tu pṛthivīpratyayanivṛttistadā tanmātrāṇāṃ sāmānyabhāvo dravyatvaṃ ca viśeṣo dharma iti yāvatpradhānaṃ tasya tu sāmānyāntarānupapatteḥ kauṭasthyameva /
GSP31yuktdipu:4029: yadi tu pṛthivyādīnāṃ nityamavyāvṛtaṃ sati kauṭasthyameṣāṃ prāptam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4032: athavā sukhaduḥkhamohaśaktaya eveha mahadādinā viśeṣāntena liṅgena pariṇāmaṃ pratipadyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:4033: tāsāṃ ca satataṃ sāmānyapratyayanimittatvātsvarūpādapracyute taddravyatvaṃ liṅgasya dharmatvam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4038: yadi sukhādiśaktaya eva pariṇāminyo yadidaṃ brahmādi sthāvarāntaṃ vaiśvarūpyaṃ tannopapadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4045: tathā guṇaśaktayo viśiṣṭāḥ parasparāśrayaviśeṣād brahmādi stambāntaṃ jātyākṛtivāgbuddhisvabhāvāhāravihārarūpaṃ vaiśvarūpyaṃ pratipadyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:4052: kutaḥ saṃśaya iti cet anupalabhyamānasyobhayathā dṛṣṭatvādityuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4055: vijñānaskandhavyatirikto nāsti kaścidartha iti śākyaputrīyāḥ pratipannāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4076: na dṛśyate so 'pi kaścidyo bhāvayati śūnyatām //
GSP31yuktdipu:4082: ucyate- yattāvaduktaṃ pratyakṣataḥ pūrvavaccheṣavadbhyāṃ cātmano nopalabdhiriti,
