GSP31yuktdipu:4096: yadi ca tairatideśaḥ kāryakāraṇasaṃghātasya kriyate prāptamasya tadvatsaṃghātārthatvam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4106: sati hi saṃghātatve devadattādivadayaṃ puruṣaḥ pratyakṣata evopalabhyeta /
GSP31yuktdipu:4107: tathā ca sati saṃśayābhāvātpravṛttirevāsya vādasya na syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4114: tadyathā śayanādyaṅgānāṃ sati parasparopakāritve tato 'nyenārthavattvāttadabhāve cārthānarthakyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4115: evaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ sati parasparopakāritve tato 'nyenārthavattvaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP31yuktdipu:4117: āha, śayanādīnāṃ devadattārthatvāttasya ca bhedā bahirbhāvātparasparārthatvaprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4130: prasiddhena hyaprasiddhaṃ taddharmatāmāpadyate bhavadbhirapyuktaṃ “yasya hi pratikṣaṇamanyathātvaṃ nāsti tasya bāhyapratyayayoḥ bhedaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:4139: triguṇamaviveki viṣayaḥ sāmānyamacetanaṃ prasavadharmi ca bāhyādhyātmikaṃ tathā pradhānam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4145: tasmādasti tadvyatirikto yadadhiṣṭhitānāṃ guṇānāmayaṃ citrarūpo vipariṇāmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4152: yathāpuruṣārthaḥ siddhyati tathā guṇā kāryakāraṇabhāvena vyūhyanta ityatastatpāratantryādeṣāmadhiṣṭhitatvamupapadyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:4181: tattu khalvidamiṣyate rūpaṃ pratītya cakṣuścotpadyate cakṣurvijñānamityādi,
GSP31yuktdipu:4185: syānmataṃ nāyaṃ niyamaḥ yaduta yajjātīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ tajjātīyakena kāryeṇa bhavitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4194: yathā satyetasminvilakṣaṇakāryaprādurbhāve bhavataścetanāccittānnācetanaṃ ghaṭādyutpadyata iti niyamaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:4195: tathā satyetasminvilakṣaṇakāryaprādurbhāve nācetanebhyo rūpādibhyaścetanaṃ cittamutpadyata ityayaṃ niyamo naḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4198: syādetat yathācetanebhyaḥ sattvādibhyo 'vyavasāyakaṃ ghaṭādyutpadyata iti nedānīṃ vyavasāyako mahānnotpadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4199: evaṃ rūpādibhyo 'cetanaṃ ghaṭādyutpadyata iti nedānīṃ cetanaṃ cittaṃ notpadyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4206: āha, kiṃ vyavasāyacaitanyayoḥ kaścidrūpabhedo 'sti na veti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4207: ucyate- kiṃ tarhi traiguṇyātsati pratyayarūpatve saṃvedyā buddhiryathā tu vyavasāyarūpaṃ tathā caitanyarūpamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4208: tathā ca vārṣagaṇāḥ paṭhanti- buddhivṛttyāviṣṭo hi pratyayatvenānuvartamānāmanuyāti puruṣa iti / āha ca
GSP31yuktdipu:4211: yathā yathā manovṛttiḥ puruṣo 'sti tathā tathā /
GSP31yuktdipu:4214: yadi tarhi yathā vyavasāyarūpaṃ tathā caitanyarūpam,
GSP31yuktdipu:4215: evaṃ sati vyavasāyamātraṃ parikalpanīyaṃ caitanyamātraṃ vā ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4221: ucyate- ya evamāha rūpābhedādarthābheda iti sa tāvadidaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ- atha kim ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4225: na hi viṣayasya vijñānapratyavabhāsamantareṇa śakyaṃ svarūpaṃ paricchettum /
GSP31yuktdipu:4226: tatra yadanyākāro gauranyākāraṃ govijñānaṃ syāttena yathānyākāreṇāśvavijñānenānyākārasya goraparicchedaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:4234: yathaiva tarhi bhavataḥ satyapyākārabhede jñānavijñeyayorgrāhyagrāhakabhāvaparikalpanādbheda evaṃ puruṣāntaḥkaraṇayorapīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4241: idānīṃ tu rūpābhede 'pi grāhyagrāhakabhāvādevaṃ bruvato mārgāntaram /
GSP31yuktdipu:4249: itareṣāṃ tu jñānamātrasya viṣayaviṣayibhāvaṃ pratiṣetsyāma iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4255: atha mā bhūdayaṃ doṣa iti puruṣo niścayarūpatvānna viṣayo na tarhyadhyavasāyādapi niśceturarthāntaraṃ kalpayitavyamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4262: yadyacetanā buddhistena tasyā adhyavasāyo vṛttirghaṭādivanna prāpnoti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4268: apratibandhena diṅniścayādiṣu suptamattamūrcchitānāṃ ca vyavasāyaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4271: yasya punarantaḥkaraṇaṃ vyavasāyakaṃ tasyaivaṃ doṣo nāsti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4275: tatra yadādhyavasāyalakṣaṇaṃ sattvaṃ guṇābhāvātpradhānabhūtena tamasā tiraskṛtaśakti bhavati tadādhyavasāyapratibandhaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4294: yāvattasya kaivalyārthaṃ pravṛttirbhavatā puruṣāstitve liṅgamapadiśyate tadidamasiddhaṃ pradipādyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4298: sādhitaṃ tu pradhānaṃ parimāṇādibhirityato na kiṃcidetat /
GSP31yuktdipu:4300: yadi puruṣasya sattvameva syāttena taṃ pratyācāryāṇāṃ na dharmavivādaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4320: tatra yuktaṃ sarvapramāṇānupalabdhernāsti puruṣa iti etadayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4322: yatpunaretaduktaṃ “asti karmāsti vipākaḥ kārakastu nopalabhyata” iti satyametat /
GSP31yuktdipu:4323: na hi puruṣaskandhānāṃ nikṣepe pratisaṃdhāne 'nyatra vā kāraka iti naḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4336: ayamapi cātmā kāryakāraṇasambandhītyataḥ saṃśayaḥ kiṃ śrotrādivadanekaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:4343: ucyate- yattāvaduktaṃ sambandhitvādātmapadārthe sandehaḥ kimaneko 'thaika iti,
GSP31yuktdipu:4344: atra brūmaḥ- bahavaḥ puruṣā iti pratijñā / kasmāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4346: janmeti mahadādeḥ sūkṣmaśarīrāśritasya liṅgasya yathāsaṃskāraṃ bāhyena śarīreṇa sambandhaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4347: maraṇamiti pūrvakṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalabhogaparisamāpteḥ sāmpratasya ca phalabhogasya pratyupasthāne liṅgasya pūrvaśarīratyāgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4349: janma ca maraṇaṃ ca karaṇāni ca janmamaraṇakaraṇāni /
GSP31yuktdipu:4352: etaduktaṃ bhavati- janmalakṣaṇaṃ ca maraṇalakṣaṇaṃ ca kāryakāraṇasyāvasthāntaram /
GSP31yuktdipu:4354: tatra yadyeka ātmā syāt tena yathaikaṃ dravyaṃ tamaḥprakāśāvekapradeśopanipātinau na śaknotyanubhavitumasambhavāt,
GSP31yuktdipu:4361: na hi śakyamekenātmanā prakāśātiśayo viṣayagrahaṇalakṣaṇo 'śuddhyatiśayaścāśaktilakṣaṇo virodhitvādyugapadupabhoktum /
GSP31yuktdipu:4373: śaktaścāsau yugapadanekāni śarīrāṇi upabhoktumityato yāvadbhiḥ śarīrairapacitāsu kālamātrāsvasminbhavaparivarte bhavitavyaṃ sarveṣāmutpattiṃ prati yugapatpravarteta /
GSP31yuktdipu:4377: katham ? yadyeka ātmā syāttena tatsaṃskāropanibaddhānyeva sarvāṇi karaṇānītyataḥ pratipaṇḍitamavasthitaiḥ karaṇairyugapadviṣayāngṛhṇīyāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4378: bādhiryādyupaghāte vā sati piṇḍāntarasambandhinā karaṇenāsya śabdādikaraṇamapratiṣiddhaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4387: iha triguṇamaviveki viṣayaḥ sāmānyamacetanaṃ prasavadharmītyete dharmāḥ pratipiṇḍamupalabhyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:4388: yathā caite tathā tatpratiyogino nairguṇyādayaḥ puruṣadharmāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4404: ucyate- yathā hi kriyāsākṣiṇi kasmiṃścidavasthite kartā tadicchānuvidhāyī kāryaṃ nirvartayati,
GSP31yuktdipu:4411: na yathā sattvādīnāṃ paraspareṇa prakāśādidharmāpekṣāṇāṃ saṃsargaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:4413: mādhyasthyamityanenātiśayanihrāsānupapatteḥ puruṣasya guṇaiḥ saha bādhānugrahānupapattiṃ svakāryapravṛttau cāpakṣapātaṃ darśayati /
GSP31yuktdipu:4418: na ca sattvādīnāṃ prakāśapravṛttiniyamalakṣaṇairdharmairitaretaropakāreṇa pravartamānānāṃ svena caitanyalakṣaṇena dharmeṇāṅgabhāvaṃ pratipadyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:4420: evaṃ saha guṇaiḥ kāryaṃ na kurute strīkumāravat /
GSP31yuktdipu:4426: tadevamanena sūtreṇācāryaḥ puruṣasyādhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ nairguṇyamaudāsīnyaṃ bhoktṛtvamakartṛtvaṃ ca sādhyatāmāpādya triguṇayādiviparyayaṃ sādhanatvenopanyati
GSP31yuktdipu:4427: taiḥ pañcabhistriguṇādiviparītaiḥ karmabhiḥ pañcānāmeṣāṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ pravṛttiravagantavyā /
GSP31yuktdipu:4432: yadyasya sukhādidharmatvamātmanaḥ prasiddhaṃ syādata etadyujjate vaktum /
GSP31yuktdipu:4436: ātmaguṇāḥ sukhādayo na śabdaguṇā ityatrāpi bhavatā viśeṣo nābhidhīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4443: tadyathā gauraḥ kṛṣṇo 'hamiti śarīradharmerātmano bhinnādhikaraṇatvamahaṅkāreṇa evaṃ sukhaduḥkhayorapi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4446: yadyapi gaurādīnāmavibhaktamahaṃkāreṇa grahaṇaṃ tathāpi pṛthagayaṃ prāgetānātmano gṛhītvā paścādavibhaktāngṛhṇanśaktnoti vyavasthāpayitumuṣyaite na punaramuṣyeti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4452: idānīṃ tu satyapi tasminpṛthaggrahaṇādabhāvaṃ bruvato mārgāntaragamanamanaikāntikasya cāparihāraḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4454: yata eva gaurādayaḥ pṛthagupalabhyante na sukhādayo eva saṃśayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4455: na ca yata eva saṃśayastata eva nirṇayo yuktaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4460: yathāgniḥ pākajanimittamupādīyate 'tha caiṣāṃ pārthivatvamevaṃ śabdādayo 'pi sukhādinimittatvenopādīyeran atha caiṣāmātmaguṇatvameva syāditi
GSP31yuktdipu:4463: yathā nimittasyāgnerna pākajaiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ pakvo 'gniḥ pacyate 'gniriti evaṃ śabdādīnāṃ nimittatvānna sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4466: āha, evamapi sukhādīnāṃ śabdādyātmabhāvo na yuktaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4468: yathā hi śabdāḥ śabdātmakā eti sarvaiḥ śabdarūpeṇa gṛhyante,
GSP31yuktdipu:4483: ātmaguṇākāṃkṣitvādadoṣa iti cet syānmatam nimittapradhānatvādanyaparipākavaśena sukhaduḥkhenotpādayatyātmanaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4484: tanmayatve tu nirākāṃkṣatvātpradhānasya vyavasthābhedo na yukta iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4495: puruṣaguṇatve tu pākajavannimittādutpannānāṃ sukhādīnāṃ viśeṣabhāvāttīvramandatānupapattiḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4507: yathā hyaṇuḥ śyāmatāṃ parityajya rūpaviśeṣameva raktalakṣaṇamupādatte,
GSP31yuktdipu:4511: tathā ākāśaṃ śabdalakṣaṇaṃ kasyāṃcidavasthāyāmaśabdakaṃ bhavatītyasmānprati sādhyo 'yamarthaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4512: bheryādiśabdāstu tadguṇa eveti pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ tasmātsukhaduḥkhayoḥ śabdādyātmabhāvo 'yuktaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4515: tasmādyuktametannirguṇa ātmā nairguṇyācca sākṣimātra iti kevalo viviktatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4516: tasmādayaṃ guṇebhyaḥ pṛthagbhūtaḥ tasmātkevalaḥ na taiḥ saha saṃsargeṇa vartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4517: āha, kaḥ punarasyātmano guṇebhyaḥ pṛthagbhāvo 'bhipreta iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4519: na hi sattvādayaḥ prakāśādibhirdharmairitaretaropakāreṇa vartamānāḥ puruṣakṛtamupakāramapekṣante /
GSP31yuktdipu:4521: tathā ca vārṣagaṇāḥ paṭhanti “pradhānapravṛttirapratyayā puruṣeṇāparigṛhyamāṇādisarge vartante” iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4539: na cācetanānāṃ draṣṭṛtvamupapadyate ityataḥ puruṣa eva caitanyād dṛṣṭā nānyattattvāntaram /
GSP31yuktdipu:4555: yathā vibhutve sati pradhānasya sakriyatvamevaṃ puruṣasya iti vibhutve sakriyatvena bhavitavyamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4561: evaṃ niṣkriyaḥ puruṣaḥ niṣkriyatvācca pradhānātkāryakāraṇaṃ na kurute /
GSP31yuktdipu:4568: pūrvasmādeva hetoḥ athāpi syātsvataḥ puruṣaḥ kāryakaraṇaṃ kuruta iti tadapyayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4573: syātpunaretat avyapadiśya yoniṃ puruṣo 'bhidhyānamātreṇa kāryakaraṇaṃ kurute ityasadetat /
GSP31yuktdipu:4581: nādhyavasāyaṃ kurute puruṣo naivaṃ sthitiṃ prayogaṃ vā /
GSP31yuktdipu:4582: na svātmano na parato na vyapadeśānna cobhayataḥ //
GSP31yuktdipu:4590: guṇakartṛtve ca tathā karteva bhavatyudāsīnaḥ // ISk_20 //
GSP31yuktdipu:4604: yadi cetanasaṃyogād buddhyādīnāṃ pratyayavadupacāraḥ vyāpitvādasya ghaṭādibhirapi saṃyogo na pratiṣidhyata ityataḥ prāptasteṣāmapi pratyayavadupacāraḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:4609: yathopadhānasaṃyogaviśeṣe satyākāśasphaṭikayoḥ sphāṭikamevopadhanasarūpaṃ pratyavabhāsate śaktito nākāśam,
GSP31yuktdipu:4610: evaṃ puruṣasaṃyogāviśeṣe buddhighaṭayoḥ śaktito buddhireva cetanārūpāpannevopalabhyate, na ghaṭaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4613: yadi tarhi karaṇasambandhātpuruṣaḥ kartṛtvopacāraṃ viṣayasarūpatāṃ ca pratipadyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:4621: ata evāsya satyāṃ cetanāśaktau vyavasāyakartṛtvaṃ pratiṣidhyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:4624: na hyasya nityatvātkiṃcidanugrahāya nāpaghātāya / āha ca
GSP31yuktdipu:4640: puruṣasya hi guṇānāṃ ca saṃyogaḥ parikalpyamāno 'nyatarakarmajo vā parikalpyate yathā sthāṇuśyenayoḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:4649: yathāgneḥ svābhāvikādauṣṇyānmokṣo na bhavati evamātmanaḥ svābhāvikatvādguṇasaṃyogādanirmokṣaprasaṃgaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4653: svasvāmiśaktinimitte hi saṃyoge parikalpyamāne śaktyoḥ satatāvasthānādanirmokṣa eva prasajyeta /
GSP31yuktdipu:4657: tasyā eva tu pravṛtte puruṣārthamapohya nimittāntaraṃ śakyaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP31yuktdipu:4659: tasmādayuktaṃ puruṣasya guṇānāṃ ca yogyatālakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4663: yadi ca yādṛcchiko guṇapuruṣasaṃyogaḥ syāttasyājñānānnivṛttirnāstīti tadarthasyābhyutthānasyānarthakyaṃ prāptaṃ viśeṣānupapatteśca kāraṇāntaraṃ kalpayitum /
GSP31yuktdipu:4667: satatameva hi puruṣasya viṣayitvamavyāvṛttaṃ guṇānāṃ ca viṣayatvamityanirmokṣaprasaṃga eva syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4675: yatrāsau na saṃbhavati tatra sannidhimātrasāmānyād bhaktyā kalpyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4685: ayaṃ tvanyo 'rthanimittaḥ śāstrīyaḥ saṃyogo bhavatā paribhāṣyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4693: etaduktaṃ bhavati- sannidhānāviśeṣe sati ātmana ākāśādeśca yasmāddṛkchaktiyuktaḥ puruṣaḥ tasmātkāryakāraṇatāmāpannena pradhānena saha bhoktṛtvena
GSP31yuktdipu:4696: yathā tṛptyarthā bhujikriyā tṛptyau satyāṃ nivartate prāptyarthā gamikriyā prāptau satyām,
GSP31yuktdipu:4697: evaṃ puruṣasya pradhānena darśanārthaḥ saṃyogaḥ darśane sati nivartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4698: tathā ca vakṣyati dṛṣṭā mayetiyupekṣaka eko dṛṣṭāhamityuparataiketi (ISk 66) /
GSP31yuktdipu:4702: ucyate yadyapyetadevaṃ tathāpi yathā puruṣasya darśanārthaḥ saṃyogaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:4706: satyapi hi darśanāviśeṣe pradhānaṃ puruṣasya kaivalyārthaṃ pravartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4707: yadāsya buddhistamaso 'ṅgitvādye guṇāḥ kāryarūpāpannāḥ śiraḥpāṇyādaya ādhyātmikā,
GSP31yuktdipu:4711: yadā tvanye guṇāḥ prakṛtibhūtā vikārabhūtāḥ kāryabhūtāḥ kāraṇabhūtā acetanāḥ parārthā
GSP31yuktdipu:4712: anyo 'haṃ na prakṛtirna vikṛtirna kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃ nācetanaḥ svārtha iti bhinnapratyayopasaṃhāraṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:4714: so 'yaṃ puruṣasya dṛkchaktinimittaḥ pradhānasya ca kaivalyāvadhiparicchinnaḥ puruṣārthaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4719: tadyathā agnerdahanaṃ paraśośchedanamasati dāhye chedye na vyajyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4722: tathā pradhānamapyantareṇa puruṣopakāraṃ svakādasarmarthamaniṣpannakāryasamaṃ cetitamanarthakama syādityataḥ puruṣamapekṣate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4725: yathā paṅgurnāntareṇāndhaṃ dṛkchaktyā viśiṣṭenārthenārthavānbhavati andhaśca nāntareṇa paṅguṃ viśiṣṭenārthena,
GSP31yuktdipu:4726: evaṃ pradhānaṃ nāntareṇa puruṣaṃ kṛtamapi kāryaṃ draṣṭuṃ śaktamanavadhikaṃ ca pravartamānaṃ viśeṣābhāvānnaiva nivartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4727: tathā puruṣaḥ satyapi cetanatve nāntareṇa pradhānamupalabhyābhāvādupalabdhā bhavediti pradhānamapekṣate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4729: vinā sargeṇa bandho hi puruṣasya na yujyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4732: kasmāt ? na hyasau vinā sargeṇa na yujyata iti / āha ca
GSP31yuktdipu:4742: sā cāpekṣā puruṣānantyānna nivartata ityato 'rthavatīnāṃ hi prakṛtīnāṃ tadaparisamāpterna nivṛtirasti // 21 //
GSP31yuktdipu:4743: // iti śrīyuktidīpikāyāṃ saptatipaddhatau pañcamamāhnikaṃ dvitīyaṃ ca prakaraṇam // @-----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31yuktdipu:4745: evaṃ kāraṇāntarapratiṣedhātprakṛteḥ puruṣārtho 'yaṃ vyaktabhāvena vipariṇāma iti sthitam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4750: tadanyeṣāṃ purāṇetihāsapraṇetḥṇāṃ mahato 'haṃkāro vidyata iti pakṣaḥ- mahato 'smipratyayakartṛtvābhyupagamāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4752: mahataḥ ṣaḍaviśeṣāḥ sṛjyante pañca tanmātrāṇyahaṃkāraśceti vindhyavāsimatam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4767: prākṛtavaikṛtikāni tu jñānāni prerakāṅgasaṃgṛhītāni pradhānādāgacchanti ceti pañcādhikaraṇaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:4774: evamanekaniścayeṣvācāryeṣu ye tāvatpradhānamahatorantarāle tattvāntaramicchanti tatpratikṣepāyācāryaḥ svamatamupanyasyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:4780: anyasya tu pakṣe naivāhaṃkāro vidyata iti pratiṣedhavivakṣayedamāha /
GSP31yuktdipu:4784: mahataḥ ṣaḍaviśeṣāḥ sṛjyante pañca tanmātrāṇyahaṃkāraśceti tannirāsārthamāha
GSP31yuktdipu:4789: tasmādapi ṣoḍaśakāt pañcabhyaḥ pañca bhūtāni // ISk_22 //
GSP31yuktdipu:4790: tasmādapi ṣoḍaśakādgaṇādyaḥ pañcako gaṇastataḥ pañca mahābhūtānyutpadyante /
GSP31yuktdipu:4792: bhūtasaṃjñā hi tanmātrāṇāṃ na pṛthivyādīnāmatra tu sāṃkhyācāryāṇāmavipratipattiḥ bhūtakauṭasthyavādinastu mīmāṃsakā ārhatāśca /
GSP31yuktdipu:4800: puruṣa evāyamiti yaḥ pratyayo niścayo 'rthagrahaṇaṃ so 'dhyavasāyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4806: abhivyakteradoṣa iti cetsyādetannendriyasannidhānādibhirarthagrahaṇaṃ janyate kiṃ tarhyabhivyajyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4809: sā hyabhivyaktiḥ svarūpalābho vā syāt grahaṇapratibandhavyudāso vā /
GSP31yuktdipu:4810: kiṃ cātaḥ ? tadyadi tāvatsvarūpalābhaḥ kriyate 'rthagrahaṇamiti prāptam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4824: sādhyaṃ caitat kiṃ tadeva mṛddravyaṃ ghaṭādivṛttibhedamanubhavati āhosvitpratyayāntaravaśādanyaccānyaccotpadyate iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4826: upetya vānuvṛttiṃ brūmaḥ- na hi tadekaṃ mṛddravyam,
GSP31yuktdipu:4833: parimāṇādadoṣa iti cet syānmatam sattvādīnāmaṅgāṅgibhāvaniyamāttena tenārthagrahaṇātmanā vipariṇāmo vṛttiriti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4838: atha nāśotpādau tena dharmadharmiṇorananyatvāddharmāṇāṃ nāśotpādādbuddherapi nāśotpādaprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4855: kasyātra vipratipattiranityā vā buddhiḥ syānnityā veti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4862: tasmādanitye satyapi viśeṣānabhidhāne kṣaṇikatvamevānena hetunā buddheḥ pratipādyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4869: svakāraṇapariniṣpannāyā hi buddhervyāpāro 'rthagrahaṇasaṃjñaka indriyādisannidhānāpekṣo na buddhiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4877: tathāpyuparatavyāpārasyāpi paraśvādervṛttimataḥ svarūpa noparamatīti bhedamupacarya vyavahāro nānākāryaviṣayaḥ pravartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4884: so 'pi vṛttiviṣaya iti kṛtvā tadapyuktamindriyādibhede bhedāditi /
GSP31yuktdipu:4890: udakasyānanasaṃyogāddravyāntarameva pratibimbalakṣaṇamutpadyate na tu mukhaṃ bhidyate iti asadetat /
GSP31yuktdipu:4896: kṣaṇabhaṅgapratiṣedhe coktaṃ na pṛthivyādīnāmanyathā cānyathā cotpattiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4897: yatpunaretaduktaṃ naikaṃ mṛddravyamiti tatra buddhiḥ pramāṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4899: tatra yadi mṛdo 'nekatvena prayojanaṃ buddhirupalabhyate- vayamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4901: mṛddravyasya saṃsthānavyatirekeṇa svabhāvo 'vadhāryate na tu buddherarthagrahaṇamantareṇa svarūpagrahaṇamiti,
GSP31yuktdipu:4906: yathā bāhyārthākāravaccittasantatiratha ca suptamūrchitavirodhasamāpannānāmartharūpādṛte bījamātrāstītyupagamyate sā citi kāpi vāvastheti vacanāt,
GSP31yuktdipu:4907: na ca gṛhyate tathā buddhirapīti kasmānna parikalpyate ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4908: yatpunaretaduktam yadi dharmāntaropādānaparityāgau vyaktavyaktī dattottara eṣa pakṣa iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4910: asmābhirapi tarhyasatkāryapratyākhyāne dattottara eṣa pakṣo vyaktitarna kriyate iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4911: nāśotpādau tu aniṣṭāveveti na parihāraṃ pratyādaraḥ kriyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4916: bhavata eva naṣṭotpannebhyaḥ skandhebhyo nānyā santatiratha ca nāsti doṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4917: kayāpi yuktayā syādetadanyaivāsāviti tataścaikā santatiriti hīnam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4920: sattvaṃ hi prakarṣamanubhavadrajastamasī ca nyūnatāṃ dharmādirūpāṃ buddherāpyāyanti,
GSP31yuktdipu:4922: evaṃ rahastamo vā prakarṣamanubhavatsattvaṃ ca nyūnatādharmādirūpaṃ buddherāpyāyanti,
GSP31yuktdipu:4927: atra brūmaḥ- grahaṇānyatve coktaṃ vṛttibhedo na vṛttimadbhedaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4930: upetya vā brūmaḥ- yadi pratyarthamanyadanyadgrahaṇaṃ kalpyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:4932: tathā kalmāṣaṃ śabalaṃ citramityanekārtharūpamekaṃ grahaṇaṃ na syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4936: buddhestu triguṇātmakatvāttasya guṇasya prakarṣe tattadrūpāntaramutpadyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4937: āha, kasya guṇasya prakarṣe buddheḥ kiṃ lakṣaṇaṃ rūpāntaramupajāyate ?
GSP31yuktdipu:4941: atra tvetadrūpamiti satyapi dharmādibhede buddhirityabhedavivakṣāviṣaya ekavacananirdeśaḥ kriyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4942: etaduktaṃ bhavati yadā rajastamasī vaśamāpādya buddhigataṃ sattvamutkṛṣṭaṃ bhavati tadā dharmo jñānaṃ virāga aiśvaryamityetadrūpaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:4943: tatra śrutismṛtivihitānāṃ karmaṇāmanuṣṭhānādbuddhyavasthaḥ sattvāvayava āśayabhūto dharma ityucyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:4948: akrodho guruśuśrūṣā śaucamāhāralāghavamapramāda iti pañca niyamāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4958: abhyāsajaṃ punaḥ vairāgyapūrvāvajayapṛṣṭhalabdhaṃ śāntamamalaṃ dhruvaṃ sakalabhavābhavapratipakṣabhūtam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4964: tatrendriyāṇāṃ viṣayābhilāṣalakṣaṇakaṣāyapācanaṃ prati yaḥ prayatna utsāhaḥ sā yatamānasaṃjñā /
GSP31yuktdipu:4966: yadā tu keṣāṃcidindriyāṇāṃ paripakvaṃ sā vyatirekasaṃjñā /
GSP31yuktdipu:4967: vyatiricyante hi tadā yaterindriyāṇi paripakvāṇyaparipakvebhyo viśiṣṭatarāṇi bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4969: nivṛttasarvendriyaviṣayecchasya yaterekameva manolakṣaṇamindriyaṃ tadā paripakvaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:4971: saṃkalpamūlocchinnaviṣayamṛgatṛṣṇo hi ayaṃ yatirindriyāṇāmantaḥkaraṇasya ca pravṛttinivṛttyorīṣṭe /
GSP31yuktdipu:4974: tadevaṃ caturavasthaṃ vairāgyaparva vijñāya tadanuṣṭhānāya yatiḥ prayateta /
GSP31yuktdipu:4975: tasyopāyo dṛṣṭānuśravikaviṣayapratyākhyāne ya upadiṣṭo yaśca tuṣṭiṣu vakṣyamāṇastamekīkṛtyottarottarāṃ tattvabhūmiṃ vijñānasya viṣayīkurvanpūrvasyāṃ tattvabhūmau madhyasthaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:4977: yatpunaraṣṭavidhaṃ aṇimā mahimā laghimā garimā prāptiḥ prākāmyamīśitvaṃ vaśitvaṃ yatrakāmāvasāyitvamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:4988: śāstracoditasya nityasya ca karmaṇo 'nuṣṭhānād buddhyavasthastamo 'vayava āśayatāṃ pratipanno 'dharmaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:4991: yathā ca jñānaṃ dvividhaṃ śabdādyupalabdhilakṣaṇaṃ guṇapuruṣāntaropalabdhilakṣaṇaṃ caivamajñānamapi viparyayeṇa vācyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4992: yathā ca caturavasthaṃ vairāgyaṃ tathā yatamānādikaścaturavastho rāgaḥ yathā cāṣṭaguṇamaiśvaryamaṇimādi tathāṣṭaguṇamanaiśvaryamevametattāmasaṃ mahato rūpam /
GSP31yuktdipu:4999: yasmādaśuddhireva prakāśamalamatipravṛttaṃ nivartayituṃ prakarṣāpannānyābhūtā ca pravartayitum /
GSP31yuktdipu:5003: āha, yadyevaṃ tasmādidameva tāvaducyatāṃ kimasyāhaṅkārasya lakṣaṇamiti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5006: kartuḥ svātmapratyavamarśātmako yo 'yamahamiti pratyaya utpadyate sa khalvahaṃkāraḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:5011: kasmāt ? prakṛtivikārayorananyatvābhyupagamāt na hi naḥ prakṛterarthāntarabhūto vikāra iti prāgvistareṇa pratipāditam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5018: tathā ca śāstramāha “etasmāddhi mahata ātmana ime traya ātmānaḥ sṛjyante vaikārikataijasabhūtādayo 'haṃkāralakṣaṇāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5034: abhedavivakṣāyāṃ hi kṛtvā kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇamevamasmābhirupadiṣṭaṃ dvividhaḥ sarga iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5041: asya tu ṣoḍaśakasya vikārasya saṃjñālakṣaṇaprayojanānyuttaratra vakṣyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5043: yasyāmasmipratyayasya viśeṣagrahaṇaṃ bhavati- śabde 'haṃ sparśe 'haṃ rūpe 'haṃ rase 'haṃ gandhe 'hamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5049: na hi tattvāntarasanniveśināṃ sattvādīnāṃ saṃjñāntarābhidhāne kiṃcitprayojanamastīti,
GSP31yuktdipu:5058: mahadādilakṣaṇānāṃ hi guṇānāmanekarūpastattvārambha iti hi na saṃjñāntaramārabhyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5060: dharmādiviśeṣābhyupāmānmahati prasaṃga iti cet na viśeṣitatvāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:5062: na tu dharmādayastattvāntaramato na mahati prasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5064: kaḥ punaratra viśeṣo yena dharmādi na tattvāntaram,
GSP31yuktdipu:5073: āha, yadyevamidaṃ tarhi vaktavyamuṣya kāryaviśeṣasyaivaṃ saṃjñakādahaṃkārātpravṛttiriti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5090: tadyadi sattvaṃ vaikārikaśabdenocyate vaikārikāṇi caindriya ekādaśakaḥ sargaḥ pravartata ityukte gamyata etat sāttviko 'sau,
GSP31yuktdipu:5091: bhūtādestānmātra ityukte gamyata etat tāmasa iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5092: kasmāt ? na hyasti sambhavo yatsattvāttamobahulaḥ sargaḥ syāttamasaśca sattvabahula iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5098: aprasiddhārthā hi tāntrikī paribhāṣeyamanirṇītā na gamyata iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5105: katham ? yadā hi vaikāriko 'haṅkāra indriyabhāvena pravartate tadā niṣkriyatvāttaijasaṃ pravartakatvenākāṃkṣati,
GSP31yuktdipu:5109: āpo vāpsu prakṣiptā āpa eva bhavanti,
GSP31yuktdipu:5110: evaṃ sattvameva sattve tu bhedaṃ janayati guṇāntarasaṃsargamapekṣate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5111: bhūtādilakṣaṇasya tu tamasaḥ saṃsargād bhidyamānaṃ taijasena ca rajasā kriyātmakenānugṛhītamekādaśendriyabhāvamapekṣate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5112: tathā bhūtādilakṣaṇaṃ tamo 'haṅkārāttanmātrabhāvena pravartamānaṃ pravṛttyarthaṃ taijasamākāṃkṣati,
GSP31yuktdipu:5115: śāsraṃ caivamāha- “tadetasminvaikārike strakṣyamāṇa eṣa bhūtādistaijasenopaṣṭabdha evaṃ vaikārikamabhidhāvati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5116: tathaiva tasminbhūtādau srakṣyamāṇe eṣa bhūtādistaijasenoṣṭabdha etaṃ bhūtādimabhibhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5119: āha, prāgapadiṣṭa aindriya ekādaśakaḥ pravartate vaikṛtādahaṃkārāditi,
GSP31yuktdipu:5126: karṇau tvakcakṣuṣī ca rasanaṃ ca nāsikā ca karṇatvakcakṣūrasananāsikāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5141: vākca pāṇī ca pādau pāyuścopasthaśca vākpāṇipādapāyūpasthāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5158: yasmād bhautikeṣvanyeṣu ghaṭādiṣu viṣayagrahaṇasāmarthyāsambhavaḥ āhaṃkāravikāravattatsāmarthyāpratiṣedhānnendriyāṇāṃ nastatpratiṣedho 'numātavya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5174: yadi ca bhautikānīndriyāṇi na syuḥ naiṣāṃ bhautikairañjanādibhiranugrahaḥ kriyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:5182: vaiśeṣikaguṇavyañjakatvādvikārapratītiriti cet atha matam- pṛthivyādivaiśeṣiko gandho ghrāṇenābhivyajyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5187: yena ca yasya vaiśeṣikaguṇābhivyaktistasya tadvikāratvaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5210: apohya hi manaḥ saṃkalpaṃ vyastānāmindriyāntarāṇāṃ bhavānparikalpayet samastānāṃ vā ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5221: yadi samastendriyavṛttiḥ saṃkalpaḥ syātprāṇādivaditi cet syānmatam,
GSP31yuktdipu:5224: evaṃ samastendriyavṛttiḥ saṃkalpaḥ syānna cānyataravaikalye tadabhāvaḥ syāditi /
GSP31yuktdipu:5238: mano na kevalaṃ buddhīndriyamapi tu karmendriyamapi /
GSP31yuktdipu:5245: iha yasyāntastriṣu ca kāleṣu karaṇasya vṛttistadubhayapracāram,
GSP31yuktdipu:5261: āha, yadyevaṃ tasmāducyatāṃ tasya karaṇasya kasminnarthe vṛttiḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:5263: ucyate- yaduktaṃ tasya kasminnarthe vṛttirityatra brūmaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:5265: rūpādiṣu śabdasparśarūparasagandheṣu svabhedabhinneṣu pañcānāṃ śrotratvakcakṣurjihvāghrāṇānāṃ śravaṇasparśanadarśanarasanaghrāṇalakṣaṇo vyāpāro vṛttirityucyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5266: tatra karaṇanirdeśe śrotrendriyasya prākpāṭhāttadviṣayanirdeśātilaṃghane prayojanaṃ nāstīti kṛtvā śabdādiṣu pañcānāmityeva paṭhitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5271: tadyathā bhaikṣamātramasmingrāme labhyata ityukte nānyo viśeṣa iti jñāyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5273: evamālocanamātramindriyāṇāmiṣyate vṛttirityukte nānyo viśeṣa iti gamyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5275: yaduktamanyairācāryaiḥ sāmānyajñānamindriyāṇāṃ viśeṣajñānaṃ buddheriti tatpratiṣiddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5276: āha, kaḥ punarasmindarśane doṣo yata etatpratiṣidyata iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5278: yadi khalvindriyasya sāmānyajñānaṃ na syāttena viśeṣāpekṣaṃ sāmānyaṃ sāmānyāpekṣaśca
GSP31yuktdipu:5279: viśeṣa iti yatra sāmānyajñānaṃ tatra viśeṣajñānamapi na pratiṣidhyata ityubhayamapīndriyasya syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:5281: viśeṣavato vāntaḥkaraṇasya kaḥ sāmānyena virodha ityubhayasyāpi tatra sambhavādindriyānarthakyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5287: indriyasya cetpratyayaḥ syādyathā pratyayavato 'ntaḥkaraṇasya trikālaviṣayatvamevamasyāpi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:5295: yadi pradīpavadindriyaṃ prakāśakaṃ syāttena yathā tatprakāśiteṣu ghaṭādiṣvartheṣu karaṇāntaramārgaṇamevamatrāpi syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:5298: antaḥkaraṇasadbhāvādayuktamiti cet syānmatam- asti kāraṇāntaraṃ buddhilakṣaṇaṃ yadindriyeṇa pradīpavatprakāśitamarthaṃ gṛhṇāti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5316: tathā viṣayendriyavṛttyanukāreṇa niścayo gaurayaṃ śuklo dhāvatītyevamādiḥ pratyayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5318: grahaṇasyānubhavāttu saṃskārādhānaṃ tatpūrvikā ca smṛtiriti trikālaviṣayā pratyayasyetyayamanayorviśeṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5320: saṃskārāttu ghaṭādīnāṃ vyavadhānarūpaṃ pārthivaṃ chāyālakṣaṇaṃ vyañjakatvāya kalpate,
GSP31yuktdipu:5326: atha karmendriyāṇāṃ kā vṛttirityucyate- naiyāyikāstvevamāhuḥ- ghrāṇarasanacakṣustvakcchrotrāṇīndriyāṇi bhūtebhyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5327: bhūtebhya ityanena svaviṣayopalabdhilakṣaṇaṃ hīndriyāṇāṃ bhūtaprakṛtitve sati nirvahati (?) nānyathā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5329: ebhyaḥ pañcabhyo yathāsaṃkhyaṃ ghrāṇarasanacakṣustvakcchrotrāṇi pañcendriyāṇi bhavanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5333: evaṃ bhautikānīndriyāṇi svasvaviṣayamadhigantumutsahanta iti tallakṣaṇatvameṣāṃ sidhyatīti,
GSP31yuktdipu:5336: evaṃ hi sāṃkhyavṛddhā āhuḥ- āhaṅkārikāṇīndriyāṇi arthaṃ sādhayitumarhanti nānyathā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5337: tathā hi kārakaṃ kārakatvādeva prāpyakāri bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5338: bhautikāni cendriyāṇi kathaṃ prāpyakārīṇi duravartini viṣaye bhaveyuḥ ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5340: viṣayākārapariṇāmātmikā vṛttirvṛttimato 'nanyā satī sambhavatyeveti suvacaṃ prāpyakāritvam api ca mahadaṇuguṇagrahaṇamāhaṅkāritve teṣāṃ kalpate,
GSP31yuktdipu:5342: bhautikatve hi yatparimāṇaṃ karaṇaṃ tatparimāṇaṃ grāhyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:5346: vākpāṇipādapāyūpasthānāṃ tu vacanādānaviharaṇotsargānandalakṣaṇā yathākramaṃ vṛttayaḥ pratyavagantavyāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5348: tasmādya evārthapratyāyanasamartho varṇasamudāyaḥ padavākyaślokagranthalakṣaṇaḥ sa vāgindriyasyārtho nānyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5351: tataśca yadeva prakṣālanaparimārjanopasparśanādhyayanapraharaṇaśilpavyāyāmādi kṛtsnaṃ grahaṇaṃ sa indriyārthā nānyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5356: ataśca ya evāśitapītavipariṇāmasya samyakstrotomārgānusāriṇo visargaḥ sa indriyārtho nānyaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5367: tathā ca vakṣyati- dṛṣṭe tathāpyadṛṣṭe trayasya tatpūrvikā vṛttiriti (ISk 30) /
GSP31yuktdipu:5368: tasmātsargakrameṇa vinā tannirdeśaḥ prāgācāryeṇa kriyate iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5371: śāstraṃ hyevamāha- kā nu bhoḥ saṃjñā māturudare 'vasthitaṃ kumāraṃ pratyabhinirviśata iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5382: athavā naiva vayamidaṃ praṣṭavyā yathā prāgantaḥkaraṇavṛttinirdeśaḥ kartavya iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5388: yathā buddhyahaṃkāramanasāṃ hi saukṣmyānna śakyaṃ svarūpamabhidhātumityato vṛttireva lakṣaṇabhāvenopadiśyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5395: tadeva vṛttitvenācakṣāṇaḥ śrotrādīnāmeva cābhidadhānaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cāpyācakṣāṇo vṛttivṛttimatorananyatvaṃ jñāpayati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5396: anyathā tu yathādhyavasāyādi lakṣaṇamevaṃ rūpādiṣu pañcānāmalocanamātraṃ lakṣaṇamityucyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:5400: tasmādanyathā nirdeśo jñāpakaṃ vṛttivṛttimatoranyatvasyeti vyākhyātā karaṇavṛttiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5403: eṣeti sarvanāmnā pratyākṛṣṭāṃ tāmeva pratyakṣaṃ prati nirdiśati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5409: yā hīyamanukrāntā karaṇaparvaṇo 'dhyavasayādikā vṛttiriyaṃ vyastānāṃ karaṇānāṃ pratisvaṃ niyatā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5411: āha, sāmānyaviśeṣayoritaretarāpekṣatvādasāmānyābhidhānena sāmānyasyāpyabhidhānādadhyavasāyādikā karaṇānāmasāmānyā vṛttirityukte 'rthādāpannameṣāṃ sāmānyāpi vṛttirastīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5418: taiḥ sarvaiḥ sahitaḥ prāṇa iti vedānteṣvapi /
GSP31yuktdipu:5422: na ca dharmāntaraṃ dharmāntarasya vyāpāro bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5426: kiṃ tu sāmānyakaraṇavṛttyā preryamāṇo vāyustatpravaṇatvāttatkāryatāṃ pratipadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5427: tatra prāṇādikārye vāyau prāṇopacāraṃ kṛtvā evamucyate- prāṇādyā vāyavaḥ pañca /
GSP31yuktdipu:5429: kathametadavagamyate 'rthāntarapreritasya vāyoriyaṃ kriyā bhavati na punaḥ svatantrasyeti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5435: kasmāt ? sarvatra prasaṃgāt svābhāvike hi vāyordiksaṃcāre 'bhyupagamyamāne sarvatra tatsaṃbhavaḥ syāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:5449: sa cāyaṃ vāyureka eva sthānasaṃcāraviśeṣānnānākhyo bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5450: yathaiko devadattaḥ pācako lāvaka iti kvacit /
GSP31yuktdipu:5460: yo 'yaṃ mukhanāsikābhyāṃ sañcarati so 'ntarvṛttirvāyuḥ prāṇa ityabhidhīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5461: yā kācitpraṇatirnāma bhūteṣu tadyathā praṇateyaṃ senā,
GSP31yuktdipu:5470: tadyathā mahatā vā duḥkhenābhiplutasya mahatā vā bandhunā viyuktasya,
GSP31yuktdipu:5474: yo 'yaṃ rasaṃ dhātūn śukraṃ mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ vātārtavagarbhāṃścākarṣannadhogacchannayamantarvṛttirvāyurapāna ityabhidhīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5475: yaccāpi kiṃcidapakramaṇaṃ nāma bhūteṣu tadyathā apakrānto 'yaṃ dharmādibhyastadviparītebhyo vā iti bāhyā khalvapānavṛttireṣā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5478: eṣā hyetaṃ prāṇamūrdhvaṃ vartamānamarvāgeva sanniyacchati arvāgeva sanniruṇaddhi /
GSP31yuktdipu:5482: yastvayaṃ prāṇāpānayormadhye hṛdyavatiṣṭhate sa samāno vāyurantarvṛttiḥ yaścāpi kaścitsaha bhāvo nāma bhūteṣu dvandvārāmatā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5485: saha tapaścariṣyāmi saha bhāryāputrairbandhubhiḥ suhṛdbhiśca vartiṣya bāhyā samānavṛttireṣā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5488: eṣa hyetau prāṇāpānau ūrdhvamarvākca vartamānau madhya eva sanniyacchati,
GSP31yuktdipu:5494: prāṇānte sarvaprāṇināṃ prāṇāpānāvutsṛjyordhvamadhaśca muktayoktrau hayāviva viṣamaṃ saṃcārayan śarīraṃ sa parāsyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5496: yastvayaṃ prāṇāpānasamānānāṃ sthānānyatikramya rasaṃ dhātūṃścādāya mūrdhānamārohati
GSP31yuktdipu:5499: yaścāpi kaścidātmotkarṣo nāma bhūteṣu tadyathā hīnādasmi śreyān,
GSP31yuktdipu:5510: sa caiṣo 'trābhivyakto bhavati śītodakena vā paryukṣitasya prāsamasiṃ vikośaṃ codyatamabhipaśyataḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5512: yastvayamālomanakhāccharīraṃ vyāpya rasādīnāṃ dhātūnāṃ pṛthivyādināṃ vyūhaṃ marmaṇāṃ ca praspandanaṃ prāṇādīnāṃ ca sthitiṃ karoti so 'ntarvṛttirvyānaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:5513: yaścāpi kaścidatyantāvinābhāvo nāma bhūteṣu tadyathā pativratā bhartāraṃ mṛtamapyanugacchati
GSP31yuktdipu:5514: bhavāntare 'pyayameva bhartā syāt tathā dharmādibhistadviparītaiśceti bāhyo vyānaviṣaya evaiṣa prabhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5516: katham ? anena hi vyāpte śarīradaṇḍake tadvaśīkṛtānāṃ prāṇādīnāṃ samā sthitirbhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5518: tadyathā hā tarhi pādau haimau śītībhūtau gulphe jaṅghe urū kaṭirudaramuraḥkaṇṭhe 'sya khuraghuro vartate hū(?)
GSP31yuktdipu:5520: evamete prāṇādyāḥ sthānakāryaviśeṣasūcitāḥ pañca vāyavo vyākhyātāḥ teṣāṃ prerikā sāmānyakaraṇavṛttiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:5522: sa ca dharmādisaṃskārabhāvanāvaśādanuparato jīvanam / āha ca
GSP31yuktdipu:5525: sā yāvadaniruddhā tu hanti vāyuṃ rajo 'dhikā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5546: tadetatprāṇāṣṭamaṃ vaikārikaṃ guṇaśarīrasya paridraṣṭuḥ kṣetrajñasya śarīramādadānasya nityaṃ stambhasthānīyaṃ pratyaṅgaṃ bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:5548: anityāni punarbhautikāni bāhyāni kuśamṛttikāsthānīyāni upacīyante ceti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5549: āha, kutaḥ punariyaṃ prāṇādivṛttiḥ pravartata iti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:5551: mahataḥ pracyutaṃ hi rajo vikṛtam aṇḍasthānīyāḥ pañca karmayonayo bhavanti- dhṛtiḥ śraddhā sukhā vividiṣā avividiṣeti / āha ca
GSP31yuktdipu:5552: pracyuto mahato yastu na prāpto jñānalakṣaṇam /
GSP31yuktdipu:5560: tatra yadāyaṃ jantuḥ śubhāśubheṣu kāryeṣu vṛttyanusārī jijñāsurajijñāsurvā śarīraṃ parityajati tāmeva karmayonimupapadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5563: vāci karmaṇi saṃkalpe pratijñāṃ yo na rakṣati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5566: dānaṃ parigrahaḥ śaucaṃ śraddhāyāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ smṛtam //
GSP31yuktdipu:5567: sukhārthī yastu seveta vidyāṃ karma tapāṃsi vā /
GSP31yuktdipu:5568: prāyaścittaparo nityaṃ sukhāyāṃ sa tu vartate //

GSP31yuktdipu:5608: āha, yeyamekaikasmin rūpādāvarthe karaṇacatuṣṭayasya vṛttiḥ sā kiṃ yugapat āhosvit krameṇeti ?

GSP31yuktdipu:5650: tathā ca vṛṣagaṇavīreṇāpyuktaṃ bhavati ___ anāgatavyavahitaviṣayajñānaṃ tu liṅgagāgamābhyām / āha ca

GSP31yuktdipu:5675: āha, kiṃ punareṣāṃ karaṇānāṃ svaviṣayaniyamena vṛttirbhavati āhosvidvyatikareṇeti ?

GSP31yuktdipu:5688: ucyate- atrāpi nāstīndriyāṇāṃ svaviṣayagrahaṇavyatikaraḥ / kiṃ tarhi

GSP31yuktdipu:5701: rasanasya vṛtiṃ saṃvedya pādau viharaṇamārabhete hastāvādānaṃ,
GSP31yuktdipu:5716: kiṃ tarhi svaviṣayasya paṭoḥ sahacāriṇamarthamindriyāntaraviṣayatāmāpannaṃ saṃspṛśya svabhāvata indriyāntaraṃ svaviṣayaṃ prati sākāṃkṣaṃ bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:5721: yathā buddheḥ prasādamanantaraṃ bhautikānāmavayavānāṃ mukhanayanādīnāṃ prasādo bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:5732: yathā kiṃcidindriyaṃ viṣaye pravṛttaṃ bhavati tadā taddvāreṇa samastamarthamupalabhya tatsahacāriṇamarthāntaramākāṃkṣadindriyāntaraṃ vṛttyā pratitiṣṭhate /
GSP31yuktdipu:5734: tathā ca tantrāntare 'pyuktaṃ- “yasya yasyendriyasya viṣayaṃ manodhyāyatyabhisampattyarthena tasya tasyautsukyaṃ pravṛttiśca bhavatīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:5735: ” etaduktaṃ svāṃ svāṃ pratipadyante parasparākūtahetukīṃ vṛttiriti /

GSP31yuktdipu:5738: kiṃ tarhi svaviṣayasaṃkalpānugṛhītasya manasaḥ saṃsparśātsvayamevendriyaṃ svaviṣayaṃ pratipadyate /

GSP31yuktdipu:5747: indriyāntare 'pi hi tarhi rajo 'stītyata ātmabhūtenaivāsya nimittena pravṛttirapratiṣiddhā,
GSP31yuktdipu:5750: caitro hi paraśvādīnāṃ prayogaṃ karaṇāntareṇa karoti /

GSP31yuktdipu:5769: pañca karmendriyāṇi pañca buddhīndriyāṇi mano 'haṅkāro buddhiścetyetatsarvaṃ puruṣārthopayogikaraṇam /

GSP31yuktdipu:5774: āha, satyam, pradhānalakṣaṇānāṃ guṇānāṃ vaiṣamyamātrarūpatve 'pi tattvāntaramasau bhaviṣyatīti /

GSP31yuktdipu:5826: ata evedamācāryeṇāpekṣya manaso 'ntaḥkaraṇatvaṃ pṛthaguktam- taccendriyamubhayathā samākhyātam,

GSP31yuktdipu:5850: buddhyahaṃkāramanolakṣaṇasya hi trayasyopāttaviṣayā buddhīndriyakarmendriyavṛttayaḥ samparkādviṣayarūpapratyavabhāsanimittatāmupagacchantyo viṣayākhyatāṃ labhante /
GSP31yuktdipu:5852: buddhistu niścayarūpatvātkaraṇāntaranirapekṣā sarvamarthaṃ pravṛttau prati niścayarūpeṇādhyastaṃ puruṣāyopasaṃharati /
GSP31yuktdipu:5853: tatra śabdādisannidhāne vṛttīnāṃ tādrūpyāpattestadapagame ca tādrūpyāpagamāt prāpyakāri /
GSP31yuktdipu:5860: atha coktaṃ kāryaṃ ca tasya daśadhā viśeṣalakṣaṇamaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:5861: tatra kena karaṇena kasya viṣayasya grahaṇamiti ?

GSP31yuktdipu:5953: āha, karaṇāviśeṣādayuktam antaḥkaraṇasya hīndriyānāṃ ca karaṇatvamaviśiṣṭam /

GSP31yuktdipu:5992: āha, kaḥ punaratra heturyena dvāritvāviśeṣe satyahaṃkāramanasī buddhau viṣayādhānaṃ kuruto na punaranayoḥ sākṣātpuruṣeṇa sambandha iti ?

GSP31yuktdipu:6004: etaduktaṃ sarvaṃ pratyupabhogaṃ yasmātpuruṣasya sādhayati buddhiriti /

GSP31yuktdipu:6017: sa ca mithyājñānābhyāsavāsanānurañjitaṃ buddhipratyayamanurudhyamāno darśitaviṣayatvāttathaiva pratipadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6018: yadā tu dharmādyabhyāsāttamorūpāgame satyuttarottarāṇāṃ sattvadharmāṇamutkarṣastadā vinivṛttamithyāpratyayā vṛttiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6020: tato viparītāśca guṇā iti śuddhādhyavasāyaṃ karoti /

GSP31yuktdipu:6027: tasya ca purastāduddeśaḥ kṛtaḥ- kāryaṃ ca tasya daśadhā pañca viśeṣā iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6029: āha, yadyevaṃ tasmādidameva tāvaducyatāṃ ke viśeṣāḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:6043: sati viśeṣā udātānudāttasvaritānunāsikādayastatra na santi tasmācchabdatanmātram /
GSP31yuktdipu:6060: tebhyo bhūtānītyetāvati vaktavye pañca pañcabhya iti grahaṇaṃ samasaṃkhyākatastadutpattijñāpanārtham /
GSP31yuktdipu:6062: tataśca yadanyeṣāmācāryāṇāmabhipretam ekalakṣaṇebhyastanmātrebhyaḥ parasparānupraveśādekottarā viśeṣāḥ sṛjyanta iti tatpratiṣiddhaṃ bhavati
GSP31yuktdipu:6063: kintarhi antareṇāpi tanmātrānupraveśamekottarebhyo bhūtebhya ekottarāṇāṃ bhūtaviśeṣāṇāmutpattiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6069: atra ca vāyoḥ śītaḥ sparśa apāṃ ca,
GSP31yuktdipu:6072: rūpaṃ ca śuklaṃ bhāsvaraṃ ca tejaso 'pāṃ ca,
GSP31yuktdipu:6080: ākāro gaurāṃ raukṣyaṃ varaṇaṃ sthairyameva ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:6084: snehaḥ saukṣmyaṃ prabhā śauklyaṃ mārdavaṃ gauravaṃ ca yat /
GSP31yuktdipu:6086: ūrdhvagaṃ pāvakaṃ dagdhṛ pācakaṃ laghu bhāsvaram /
GSP31yuktdipu:6092: saṃhatānāṃ tu yatkāryaṃ sāmānyaṃ te gavādayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6094: tatrākārādidharmaiḥ pṛthivyā lokasya copakriyate bhūtāntarāṇāṃ ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:6126: tathā tiryakpātādibhirdharmairvāyunā lokasya copakāraḥ kriyate bhūtāntarāṇāṃ ca /

GSP31yuktdipu:6147: tadete yathā vyākhyātā aviśeṣā viśeṣāḥ puruṣārthasiddhyarthaṃ bahudhā vyavatiṣṭhante /
GSP31yuktdipu:6153: sūkṣmā mātāpitṛjāḥ saha prabhūtaistridhā viśeṣāḥ syuḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6154: tatra sūkṣmā nāma ceṣṭāśritaṃ prāṇāṣṭakaṃ saṃsarati /
GSP31yuktdipu:6168: tatsiddhibhyo yathā brahmaṇaḥ putrāṇāṃ tatputraputrāṇāṃ ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:6178: tatra kecinniyatāḥ kecidaniyatā ityāha- ke punaratra niyatāḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:6187: mātāpitṛjāśca prabhūtāśca ityato yukta eṣāṃ parigrahaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6190: ucyate- pūrvasarge prakṛterupapannānāṃ prāṇināṃ sattvadharmotkarṣādantareṇa dvayasamāpattiṃ manasaivāpatyamanyadvā yathepsitaṃ prādurbabhūva
GSP31yuktdipu:6191: priyaṃ khalvapi cakṣuṣā nirīkṣya kṛtārthamātmānaṃ manyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6198: tadetadadyāpyanuvartate- yatpriyaṃ cirādālokya pāṇau saṃspṛśya prītirbhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:6203: strīpuṃsau saṃdhṛṣyāpatyamutpādayetāṃ mamedaṃ mamedamiti ca parigrahāḥ pravṛttāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6206: pañcādhikaraṇasya tāvadvaivartaṃ śarīraṃ mātāpitṛsaṃsargakāle karaṇāviṣṭaṃ śukraśoṇitamanupraviśati /
GSP31yuktdipu:6208: vyūḍhāvayavaṃ tūpalabdhapratyayaṃ māturudarānnissṛtya yau dharmādharmau ṣaṭsiddhyupabhogakāle kṛtau tadvaśādavatiṣṭhate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6210: yadi dharmasaṃskṛtaṃ karaṇaṃ tato dyudeśaṃ sūkṣmaśarīreṇa prāpyate,

GSP31yuktdipu:6280: atha matamagṛhyamāṇena sambandhāt sthūlasyāpi śarīrasyāgrahaṇaṃ pretāñjanasiddhamālyādivat /

GSP31yuktdipu:6318: āśayasya sthāvaraśarīrārambhe caritārthatvātsthāvaraśarīreṇa cāśayopādānasambhavāttasya saṃsārābhāvaḥ prāptaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6322: āha, yadi puruṣārthā liṅgasyotpattirabhyupagamyate tatsamanantaramevānena puruṣārtho 'vasāyayitavyo na punardevamānuṣatiryagbhāvena punaḥ punarājañjavībhāvo 'nuṣṭhātavya iti /

GSP31yuktdipu:6343: pañcādhikaraṇasya tāvaddvividhaṃ jñānaṃ prākṛtikaṃ vaikṛtikaṃ ca /

GSP31yuktdipu:6364: tatra paramarṣeḥ paṭurūhaḥ anyeṣāṃ kliṣṭa ityayaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6365: sarveṣāmeva tu tārakādyaviśiṣṭamācārya āha- trividhā bhāvāḥ sāṃsiddhikāḥ prākṛtikā vaikṛtikāśceti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6368: katham ? yadi hi tathā syāttattvāntarānutpattisaṃghāto vyūhaścānarthakaḥ syāt /

GSP31yuktdipu:6457: āha, yadi vairāgyātprakṛtilayaḥ prāpto yadetatprakṛtau vairāgyamāñjasam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6467: tadviparītaḥ cetanaḥ svatantraśceti tato 'pi prakṛtau layaḥ tataścānirmokṣaprasaṃga iti /

GSP31yuktdipu:6499: āha, yadi tribhistribhirnimittairvairāgyādibhistrividho bandho nirvartyate yaduktamajñānād bandha iti tadayuktam /

GSP31yuktdipu:6526: katham ? evaṃ hi śāstram- “mahadādiviśeṣāntaḥ sargo buddhipūrvakatvāt /

GSP31yuktdipu:6669: ādhyātmikī iti śarīraśarīriṇorviśeṣamupalipsamānena yoginā yadanātmanyātmabuddhiravasthāpyate sā khalvādhyātmikī siddhiḥ tuṣṭiḥ santoṣaḥ kṣema ityarthaḥ /

GSP31yuktdipu:6675: kasmāt ? amitaṃ hi pradhānatattvaṃ bhāti jagadbījabhūtatvānmahadādibhāvapariṇāmena nyūnasyaikadeśasyātmana evāpūrāt /

GSP31yuktdipu:6686: tatra yathā prādhānikasya puruṣe nāsti vijñānaṃ evamitareṣāmuttareṣu tattveṣu /
GSP31yuktdipu:6696: tamaḥpradhānapuruṣopadeśe sati pratyayanirdidhārayiṣayā tayoḥ pradhānameva jyāyo na puruṣa ityabhiniviśeta /
GSP31yuktdipu:6697: tuṣṭistu kiṃ paramityāśritya pravṛttaḥ pradhānajñānamātre santoṣātpadārthāntaraṃ vijñātumeva nādriyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6705: tasmānna padārthasaṃkara iti vyākhyātā prakṛtyākhyā tuṣṭiḥ /

GSP31yuktdipu:6718: tathā ca kṛtvā śāsramāha “salilaṃ salilamiti vaikārikopanipātamevādhikurute,
GSP31yuktdipu:6720: sa khalvayaṃ yogī pārthivānavajitya tanmahimnā jagadaśūnyaṃ dṛṣṭvā padārthāntarasyābhāvaṃ manyamānastāmeva bhūmiṃ kaivalyamiti gṛhṇāti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6723: yadā ca satyupādānasāmarthye na tāvataiva bhāvānāṃ prādurbhāvaḥ kiṃ tarhi sannihitasādhanānāmapi kālaṃ pratyapekṣā bhavati- kālaviśeṣādbījādaṅkuro
GSP31yuktdipu:6737: tadyathā salilaughastṛṇaṃ kāṣṭhamaśmānaṃ prāṇinaṃ vā svamūrtisaṃsṛṣṭaṃ sarvamevābhyāvahati,
GSP31yuktdipu:6743: tathā bījānmūlaṃ mūlādaṅkuramiti vahati / tathā cāha
GSP31yuktdipu:6744: yāmeva prathamāṃ rātriṃ garbhe bhavati pūruṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6747: sa khalvayaṃ yogī kālamavajitya padārthāntarābhāvaṃ manyamānastāmeva bhūmiṃ kaivalyamiti manyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6750: yadā tu satyapi kālasāmarthye bhāvānāmutpattiḥ bhāgyānapekṣate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6752: satyapi sādhanasāmarthye kālaviśeṣe ca kasyacidutpattirbhavati kasyacinneti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6765: yathā hi śīrṇānāmapi tṛṇalatādīnāṃ vṛṣṭiṃ prāpya punarāpyāyanaṃ bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:6770: ” sa khalvayaṃ yogī bhāgyānyavajitya tanmahimnā jagadaśūnyaṃ dṛṣṭvā padārthāntarasyābhāvaṃ manyamānastāmeva bhūmiṃ kaivalyamiti gṛhṇāti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6775: prakṛtyātmakasya tāvadyogino 'ṣṭau prakṛtayo viṣaya ityuktaṃ purastāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:6794: mahataśca rūpaṃ dharmādikaṃ mahato 'rthāntaraṃ bhāgyamiti bhāgyavān /
GSP31yuktdipu:6795: athavā bāhya evāyaṃ kālaḥ karmakāraṇaṃ nirdiśyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6796: tatra cānye 'pi svamatiparikalpitapadārthāntarātmabhāvagrahā eveti sāṅkhyāḥ pravādinaḥ pratikṣiptā boddhavyā iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6797: apara āha, prakṛticaitanikaḥ pradhānabhāvāśādyupādānakālabhāgyavādino mahadahaṅkāratanmātravādina iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6799: na hi mahadahaṅkāratanmātralakṣaṇāḥ prakṛtaya upādānakālabhāgyabhāvena prasiddhāḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6802: bāhyā viṣayoparamāt pañca ca nava tuṣṭayo 'bhihitāḥ // ISk_50 //
GSP31yuktdipu:6805: tatra yadārjanadoṣamavagacchati na tāvatsarvasyābhijātirastīti arthināvaśyaṃ viṣayārjane vartitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6808: svābhāvikamavasthānaṃ viṣayāṇāmaparikalpyāpi yadā pratigrahādibhirarjanaṃ pratyādriyate tadapyayuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6810: evamapi nāsti kaścidapratyanīka viṣayopārjanāya iti tadvighāte 'vaśyaṃ prayatitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6811: sa ca yadi pratiyatamānaḥ pratyanīkivighātaṃ kuryātparopaghātenātmānugrahānuṣṭhānācchāstravirodhaḥ / yasmādāha-
GSP31yuktdipu:6823: sukhārthaṃ ca pravṛttasya bhūyiṣṭhaṃ duḥkhamevetyetasmāddarśanānmādhyasthyaṃ labhate,
GSP31yuktdipu:6827: yadā tu yogī pūrvadoṣādhigame 'bhijātyā vā yatnārjitaviṣayatve sati rakṣādoṣamupanyasyati /
GSP31yuktdipu:6830: tasyāṃ ca pravartamāno yadi paramuparundhyāt tadā pūrvoktadoṣaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:6833: rātrindivaṃ ca tadekāgramanasaḥ sukhārthaṃ pravṛtasya bhūyiṣṭhaṃ duḥkhamevetyetasmāddarśanānmādhyasthyaṃ labhate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6838: sati vā grāmanagaranigamasanniveśādyupāyānuṣṭhānādvā kṛtaviṣayarakṣo yogī kṣayadoṣamupanyasyati / katham ?
GSP31yuktdipu:6861: ityetasmād darśanānmādhyasthyaṃ labhate sāṣṭamī tuṣṭiḥ sumārīcamityucyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6863: arcateḥ pūjārthasya śobhanamarcitaṃ viṣayasaṃganivṛttasya yogino 'vasthānaṃ bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:6873: tasmādupabhogārthināvaśyamanyopaghātaḥ kāryo nihitadaṇḍena vā viṣayopabhogastyājya iti / āha ca
GSP31yuktdipu:6874: yathā yathā hi viṣayo vṛddhiṃ gṛhṇāti dehinām /
GSP31yuktdipu:6882: katham ? uttamaṃ hi prāṇināṃ sarvebhyo hiṃsābhayamiti tadapagamāduttamābhayamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6887: tatra yeṣāmarjanarakṣaṇe pratyādriyate viṣayī tadarthinā pratyanīkānāmavaśyamabhighāto 'nuṣṭhātavya ityādāvuktam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6888: iha tu yeṣāmevārjanarakṣaṇe tadanupaghātenāśakyo viṣayopabhoga ityetadvivakṣitam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6891: jñānināṃ tu vairāgyaparvasaṃjñitā svāsu svāsu tattvabhūmiṣu siddhā eveti // 50 // @-----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31yuktdipu:6897: sādyā siddhiḥ tārakamityapadiśyate- tārayati saṃsārārṇavāditi tārakam /
GSP31yuktdipu:6898: yadā tu svayaṃ pratipattau pratihanyamāno gurūpadeśāt pratipadyate sā dvitīyā siddhiḥ sutāramityapadiśyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6900: yadā tvanyopadeśādapyasamarthaḥ pratipattumadhyayanena sādhayati sā tṛtīyā siddhiḥ tārayantamityapadiśyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6901: tadetat tāraṇakriyāyā adyatve 'pi avyāvṛtatvāt mahāviṣayatvāt tārayantamityapadiśyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6902: ta ete trayaḥ sādhanopāyairābrāhmaṇaḥ prāṇino 'bhipretamarthaṃ prāpnuvanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6904: te 'parebhyo 'sākṣātkṛtadharmebhya upadeśena mantrān samprāhurupadeśāya glāyanto 'pare bilmagrahaṇāyemaṃ granthaṃ samāmnāsiṣurvedañca vedāṅgāni ceti” /
GSP31yuktdipu:6905: bilmaṃ bhāsanam- samyak pratibhāsāya viśiṣṭaḥ saṃketa uktaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:6908: tatra cādhyātmikānāṃ vātādīnāṃ siddhipratyanīkānāmāyurvedakriyānuṣṭhānena vighātaṃ kṛtvā pūrveṣāṃ trayāṇāmanyatamena sādhayati sā caturthī siddhiḥ pramodamityabhidhīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6909: katham ? nivṛttarogā hi prāṇinaḥ pramodanta iti kṛtvā /
GSP31yuktdipu:6910: yadā tvādhibhautikānāṃ mānuṣādinimittānāṃ siddhipratyanīkānāṃ sāmādinā yatidharmānuguṇena vopāyena pūrveṣāṃ trayāṇāmanyatamena sādhayati,
GSP31yuktdipu:6912: katham ? anudvigno hi pramudita iti kṛtvā /
GSP31yuktdipu:6913: yadā tu śītādīnyādhidaivikāni dvandvāni siddhipratyanīkāni svadharmānurodhena pratihatya pūrveṣāṃ trayāṇāmanyatamena sādhayati,
GSP31yuktdipu:6915: katham ? dvandvānupahatā hi prāṇino modanta iti kṛtvā /
GSP31yuktdipu:6916: suhṛtprāptiḥ- yadā tu kṛśalaṃ saṃspṛṣṭaṃ sanmitramāśritya sandehanivṛttiṃ labhate,
GSP31yuktdipu:6920: dānam- yadā tu daurbhāgyaṃ dānenātītya pūrveṣāṃ trayāṇāmanyatamena sādhayati sāṣṭāmī siddhiḥ sadāpramuditamityabhidhīyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:6924: etāsāṃ saṃśrayeṇābhipretamarthaṃ yataḥ saṃsādhayantītyataḥ pūrvācāryāgataṃ mārgamārurukṣustatpravaṇaḥ syāditi /
GSP31yuktdipu:6925: āha, kaḥ punaratra heturyena puruṣārthatvāviśeṣe sati guṇānāṃ sarvasiddhinimittaṃ tvanubhavatīti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:6940: sattvarajastamasāṃ cāṅgāṅgibhāvaniyamādviparyayāśaktituṣṭibhiḥ pratihanyata iti na sarveṣāṃ sarvadā siddhirbhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:6949: eteṣāṃ mārge 'vasthāpanātparāṃ siddhikaivalyalakṣaṇāmacireṇa prāpnoti / āha ca
GSP31yuktdipu:6959: tasmādekarūpa evāyaṃ yathaivādyatve tathaivātikrāntāsvanāgatāsu kālakoṭiṣu sarga iti /

GSP31yuktdipu:6974: yeṣāṃ tu dharmādharmaśarīrayoḥ paryāyeṇa hetuhetumadbhāvasteṣāṃ kāraṇamastyavyaktamityatra (ISk 16)
GSP31yuktdipu:6976: ye 'pi ca sāṃkhyā evamāhuḥ- “dharmādharmādhikāravaśātpradhānasya pravṛttiriti” teṣāmanyataraparikalpanānarthakyamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:6983: tatra yathedaṃ śarīramavibhaktaṃ dharmārthakāmamokṣalakṣaṇāsu kriyāsu vibhaktaṃ bhavedityataḥ pāṇyādivikalpo 'sya bhavati,
GSP31yuktdipu:6984: evaṃ sattvasargo 'pyavibhakto dharmārthakāmamokṣalakṣaṇāsu kriyāsu samartho bhavediti // 52 // @-----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31yuktdipu:7008: daivamānuṣatairyagyonā iti trividho bhūtānāṃ vikalpa upadiśyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:7017: itareṣvanantarbhāvādabhedena vopadeśaḥ kāryā na tu daivamānuṣatiraśca iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:7047: devebhyastiryagbhyaścāvakṛṣṭāsu bhūmiṣu yathā yathā sattvatamaso nirhrāsaḥ,
GSP31yuktdipu:7051: yathā ca mānuṣeṣu rajaḥprakarṣa evaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sthāne sattvasya,
GSP31yuktdipu:7057: atra jarāmaraṇakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ prānoti cetanaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:7068: indriyādhiṣṭhānavikārācchabdasparśarūparasagandhānāṃ satāmagrahaṇamasatāṃ ca grahaṇamabhūtākāraṃ sambhavaviparītaṃ vā sarvārthānāṃ grahaṇam
GSP31yuktdipu:7069: tadyathā paurṇamāsyāṃ dakṣiṇataḥ khaṇḍasyendumaṇḍalasya piśācādīnāṃ pāṇḍarasya ca nabhasa ityādi /
GSP31yuktdipu:7077: tadapi samīkṣyoktamācāryeṇa atra jarāmaraṇakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāpnoti cetanaḥ puruṣa iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:7079: yathaiva hi jarāmaraṇaṃ cātmanaḥ prakṛṣṭodvegakārakamevaṃ janmāpi /
GSP31yuktdipu:7080: tathā hyayaṃ māturudare jarāyupariveṣṭitaśarīro 'medhyaparisnuto vraṇamātrāyāṃ garbhadhānyāṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:7083: vāyunā karaiśca saṃsparśadasibhiriva tudyamānaḥ svasaṃvedyaṃ duḥkhamātmani vartamānamākhyātumasamarthaḥ
GSP31yuktdipu:7088: mānuṣatiraścāmeva janmakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavati na devānām /
GSP31yuktdipu:7093: na hi devasthāneṣu jarāmaraṇaṃ vā śrūyate,
GSP31yuktdipu:7102: evaṃ hyāha- “tvāṣṭrīyaṃ sāma bhavati indraṃ kṣāmamapi na sarvabhūtāni prasvāpayituṃ nāśaknuvaṃ stametena sāmnā tvāṣṭrīyeṇāsvāpayaditi /
GSP31yuktdipu:7113: candramā vai somo rāja yadrājānaṃ yakṣmogṛhṇāttadrājayakṣmasya janma /
GSP31yuktdipu:7118: taṃ vaiśvadevena caruṇāmāvasyāṃ rātrīmayā yajante nainaṃ yakṣmodamuñcadityādi /
GSP31yuktdipu:7121: yathā gopathabrāhmaṇam- “devānāṃ ha vā pañcadaśaśatāni āsaṃstāni brahmakilbiṣādakṣīyanta /
GSP31yuktdipu:7131: kasmāt ? tatrāpi hyādiśabdalopa udāharaṇamātratvāt śaktyā parikalpayitumidamityucyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:7137: yataśca brahmādau stambaparyante jagati jarāmaraṇakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na kaścidativartate /
GSP31yuktdipu:7140: yāvadidaṃ liṅgaṃ na nivartate tāvadavaśyaṃ duḥkhena bhavitavyam /
GSP31yuktdipu:7142: sukhaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ ca hi saṃśayaṃ vāreṇāyaṃ sevate tatra tatra /
GSP31yuktdipu:7153: tasmānnāsti saṃsāre kaścitpradeśo yatra saha liṅgenātmānaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāvāpnuyādityata evaṃ prayatitavyaṃ yena liṅgasyaivātyantocchedaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:7160: pratipuruṣavimokṣārthaṃ svārtha iva parārtha ārambhaḥ // ISk_56 //
GSP31yuktdipu:7168: pravṛtto na pravartsyati kiṃ tarhi pravartata evānantānāṃ śarīrādibhāvena parasparānugraheṇa ca /

GSP31yuktdipu:7183: mano 'haṃkārayośca buddhau svapravṛttyupasaṃhāro buddheśca śāntaghoramūḍhatvaṃ vyavasāyakartṛtvaṃ
GSP31yuktdipu:7192: teṣāṃ ca māhātmyaśarīrapradhānaṃ yadā pravartate tadetarāṇyapi /
GSP31yuktdipu:7193: tannivṛttau ca teṣāmapi nivṛttiriti paurikaḥ sāṃkhyācāryo manyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:7215: yattūktaṃ māhātmyaśarīrapradhānapravṛttāvitareṣāṃ pravṛtistannivṛttau nivṛttirityatra brūmaḥ- na,
GSP31yuktdipu:7217: yathā kṣetrajñānāṃ niratiśayatvāditaretarāpravartakatvamevameṣāmapi sātiśayatve vā pradhānānupapattiprasaṃgaḥ, vaiṣamyāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:7222: sā cediyamacetanā prakṛtirasyā apyuddiśya puruṣārthaṃ pravṛttirnopapadyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:7224: tatra yaduktaṃ pratipuruṣavimokṣārtha prakṛteḥ pravṛttiriti etadayuktamiti /
GSP31yuktdipu:7232: sādhyametat kiṃ kṣīrasyoddiśya vatsavivṛddhiṃ pravṛttiḥ, atha neti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:7236: yatra nāsti vatsavivṛddhistatra na kṣīrasya pravṛttirupalabdhā /
GSP31yuktdipu:7238: yadyasmin sati bhavati tasya tadarthā pravṛttirdṛṣṭā /
GSP31yuktdipu:7245: śāstraṃ tāvat sattāmātro mahān vyaktimātra ityarthaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:7247: na kvacidapi kūpe salilaṃ nāstyabhivyaktaṃ na tad bhavati /
GSP31yuktdipu:7253: dharmādharmāvacetanau vivṛddhikāle kṣīraṃ pravartayatastadavasāne ca nivartayataḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:7255: īśvarapreraṇāditi cet syānmatam īśvarastatra kṣīraṃ pravartayate vatsārthaṃ,
GSP31yuktdipu:7262: vārṣagaṇānāṃ tu yathā strīpuṃśarīrāṇāmacetanānāmuddiśyetaretaraṃ pravṛttistathā pradhānasyetyayaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:7263: āha, kathamavagamyate tādarthyādutpannena vyaktena puruṣasya sambandho na punaḥ sānnidhyamātrāt,
GSP31yuktdipu:7268: apravartayitāraṃ prati kāryakāraṇānāṃ pravṛttirayukteti cet syānmatam- apravartayitā kṛṣṇādīnāṃ bhikṣurato na teṣāmapi taṃ prati pravṛttiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:7271: vatso hi kṣīrasyāpravartayitātha ca taṃ prati tasya pravṛttiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:7275: yadi pradhānasya puruṣakaivalyārthā pravṛttistena tadabhāve kaivalyaṃ siddhamevetyapravṛttiprasaṃgaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:7276: atha kevale puruṣe pradhānaṃ pravartate na tarhyasya tadarthā pravṛttiriti /
GSP31yuktdipu:7280: dṛṣṭā coparamārthāpi lokasyautsukyanivṛttyarthā pravṛttistathā pradhānasyāpyuparamārthā pravṛttiḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:7281: atha dṛśyadarśanaśaktyorautsukyanivṛttyarthaṃ pravartata ityekatra kṛtārthatvāditareṣvapravṛttiprasaṃga iti cet syādetat /
GSP31yuktdipu:7288: raṅgasya darśayitvā nivartate nartakī yathā nṛtyāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:7289: puruṣasya tathātmānaṃ prakāśya vinivartate prakṛtiḥ // ISk_59 //
GSP31yuktdipu:7290: tatra nānāvarṇasvabhāvavijñānānāṃ prekṣārthināṃ puruṣāṇāṃ saṃghāto raṅga ityucyate /
GSP31yuktdipu:7292: yadi vātra kaścid brūyāt nṛttācāryeṇa kuśīlavairvā dṛṣṭaiveyaṃ kasmānna nivartate ?
GSP31yuktdipu:7295: evaṃ sarvapuruṣāṇāṃ kāryakāraṇasambandhenautsukyavatāṃ nirākāṃkṣīkaraṇārthaṃ pravṛttā prakṛtiḥ kathamekasya puruṣasyautsukyanivṛttau kṛtārthā syāt ?

GSP31yuktdipu:7321: buddhi___mupasaṃprāptā akṛtārthatvād buddhiśca pradhānaṃ tadā tiṣṭhatyayaṃ nānātvadarśī tasya saṃskārasya sāmarthyāt /
GSP31yuktdipu:7324: tadyathā kumbhakāraprayatnaviśiṣṭena daṇḍena ghaṭādiniṣpattiyogyakriyā cakrasya bhramaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:7330: niṣpanne ghaṭe pūrvasaṃskārānurodhānna nivartate na ca tadā nivṛttamiti kṛtvā saṃskārakṣaye 'pyavatiṣṭhate,
GSP31yuktdipu:7331: evaṃ samyagdarśanārthaṃ śarīraṃ samyagjñānādhigame 'pi na nivartate pūrvasaṃskāravaśāt /

GSP31yuktdipu:7334: yadā tu saṃskārakṣaye tannimittasya śarīrasya bhedaḥ, ataḥ

GSP31yuktdipu:7340: seyaṃ tattvānupūrvī tadarthapradhānādutpannā parisamāpte punaḥ pradhāne pralayaṃ gacchatīti /
GSP31yuktdipu:7341: pradhānamapyarthavaśādevāsya śarīrāṇi teṣu teṣu jātyantaraparivarteṣu karoti /

GSP31yuktdipu:7347: etatparaṃ brahmaṃ dhruvamamalamabhayamatra sarveṣāṃ guṇadharmāṇāṃ pratipralayaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:7349: etadarthaṃ brāhmaṇā dayitaputradāradhanasambandhamapahāya guruśuśrūṣāparāḥ śarīramaraṇyeṣu yātayanti /
GSP31yuktdipu:7350: kathaṃ nāmaikāntikamātyantikaṃ ca kaivalyaṃ syāditi yatraivotthānaṃ śāstrasya tatraivopasaṃhāra ācāryeṇa kṛtaḥ // 68 // @-----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP31yuktdipu:7352: āha, kimarthaṃ punaridaṃ śāstraṃ kena vā pūrvaṃ prakāśitamiti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:7355: kathaṃ nāmājñānavaśāttatsaṃskāropanipatitānāṃ prāṇināmapavargaḥ syādityevamarthamidaṃ śāstraṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP31yuktdipu:7365: ucyate- kathaṃ vedaṃ guhyaṃ na syāt ?
GSP31yuktdipu:7377: pralayo 'pi nimittāntarātsvābhāvyādeva bhūtānāmapi vyaktānāṃ niṣpattimatāmiti yāvat /
GSP31yuktdipu:7382: yāvat kiṃcidavitathaṃ bhūtaṃ tasya sarvasyeha sthityādaya ucyanta iti /
GSP31yuktdipu:7391: āha, kasmai punaridaṃ śāstraṃ paramarṣiṇā prakāśitamiti ?
GSP31yuktdipu:7410: kāryakāraṇasamprayoge duḥkhānāmapravṛttiṃ parijñāya śiṣyaguṇāṃśca kathaṃ nāma yathā
GSP31yuktdipu:7417: tena ca bahudhā kṛtaṃ tantram // ISk_70 //

GSP31yuktdipu:7425: taccedānīntanaiḥ prāṇibhiralpatvādāyuṣo granthata eva na sūpapādaṃ kiṃ punaḥ śravaṇaprayogābhyām /
GSP31yuktdipu:7426: āha ca- caturbhiḥ prakārairvidyā sūpayuktā bhavati- āgamakālena svādhyāyakālena prayogakālena ca /
GSP31yuktdipu:7428: ityasya mandadhiyāmapyāśu grahaṇadhāraṇaprayogasampatsyāditi ṣaṣṭitantrādupākhyānagāthāvyavahitāni vākyānyekata upamṛdya śiṣyānukampārthaṃ yāvat

GSP31yuktdipu:7442: paramarṣyādiyathoktāgamena pramāṇatrayaṃ puraskṛtya tarkadṛśā vicāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP31yuktdipu:7449: sphuṭābhidheyā madhurāpi bhāratī manīṣiṇo nopakhalaṃ virājate /
GSP31yuktdipu:7451: nayanti santaśca yataḥ svaśaktito guṇaṃ pareṣāṃ tanumapyudāratām /
GSP31yuktdipu:7452: iti prayātveṣa mama śramaḥ satāṃ vicāraṇānugrahamātrapātratām //
GSP31yuktdipu:7453: // iti yuktidīpikāyāṃ sāṃkhyasaptatipaddhatau caturthaṃ prakaraṇamekādaśaṃ cāhnikaṃ sampūrṇam //
